h4.p: [03] hetupaccayo ^a^T1.0001^ea^ ^a^M1.0001^ea^ ^a^V1.0001^ea^, aaramma.napaccayo, adhipatipaccayo, anantarapaccayo, samanantarapaccayo, sahajaatapaccayo, a~n~nama~n~napaccayo, nissayapaccayo, upanissayapaccayo, purejaatapaccayo, pacchaajaatapaccayo, aasevanapaccayo, kammapaccayo, vipaakapaccayo, aahaarapaccayo, indriyapaccayo, jhaanapaccayo, maggapaccayo, sampayuttapaccayo, vippayuttapaccayo, atthipaccayo, natthipaccayo, vigatapaccayo, avigatapaccayoti.
[03] 1^b^.^eb^ ^b^hetupaccayo^eb^ti ^a^V1.0002^ea^ -- hetuu hetusampayuttakaana.m dhammaana.m ta.msamu.t.thaanaana~nca ruupaana.m hetupaccayena paccayo {paccayoti (syaa0)}.

[03] 2^b^.^eb^ ^b^aaramma.napaccayo^eb^ti -- ruupaayatana.m cakkhuvi~n~naa.nadhaatuyaa ta.msampayuttakaana~nca dhammaana.m aaramma.napaccayena paccayo. saddaayatana.m sotavi~n~naa.nadhaatuyaa ^a^T1.0002^ea^ ^a^M1.0002^ea^ ta.msampayuttakaana~nca dhammaana.m aaramma.napaccayena paccayo. gandhaayatana.m ghaanavi~n~naa.nadhaatuyaa ta.msampayuttakaana~nca dhammaana.m aaramma.napaccayena paccayo. rasaayatana.m jivhaavi~n~naa.nadhaatuyaa ta.msampayuttakaana~nca dhammaana.m aaramma.napaccayena paccayo. pho.t.thabbaayatana.m kaayavi~n~naa.nadhaatuyaa ta.msampayuttakaana~nca dhammaana.m aaramma.napaccayena paccayo. ruupaayatana.m saddaayatana.m gandhaayatana.m rasaayatana.m pho.t.thabbaayatana.m manodhaatuyaa ta.msampayuttakaana~nca dhammaana.m aaramma.napaccayena paccayo. sabbe dhammaa manovi~n~naa.nadhaatuyaa ta.msampayuttakaana~nca dhammaana.m aaramma.napaccayena paccayo.
[03] ya.m ya.m dhamma.m aarabbha ye ye dhammaa uppajjanti cittacetasikaa dhammaa, te te dhammaa tesa.m tesa.m dhammaana.m aaramma.napaccayena paccayo.

[03] 3^b^.^eb^ ^b^adhipatipaccayo^eb^ti -- chandaadhipati chandasampayuttakaana.m dhammaana.m ta.msamu.t.thaanaana~nca ruupaana.m adhipatipaccayena paccayo. viiriyaadhipati viiriyasampayuttakaana.m dhammaana.m ta.msamu.t.thaanaana~nca ruupaana.m adhipatipaccayena paccayo. cittaadhipati cittasampayuttakaana.m dhammaana.m ta.msamu.t.thaanaana~nca ruupaana.m adhipatipaccayena paccayo. viima.msaadhipati viima.msasampayuttakaana.m dhammaana.m ta.msamu.t.thaanaana~nca ruupaana.m adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
[03] ya.m ya.m dhamma.m garu.m katvaa ye ye dhammaa uppajjanti cittacetasikaa dhammaa, te te dhammaa tesa.m tesa.m dhammaana.m adhipatipaccayena paccayo.

[03] 4^b^.^eb^ ^b^anantarapaccayo^eb^ti ^a^T1.0003^ea^ -- cakkhuvi~n~naa.nadhaatu ta.msampayuttakaa ca dhammaa manodhaatuyaa ta.msampayuttakaana~nca dhammaana.m anantarapaccayena paccayo. manodhaatu ta.msampayuttakaa ca dhammaa manovi~n~naa.nadhaatuyaa ta.msampayuttakaana~nca dhammaana.m anantarapaccayena paccayo.

[03] sotavi~n~naa.nadhaatu ^a^V1.0003^ea^ ta.msampayuttakaa ca dhammaa manodhaatuyaa ta.msampayuttakaana~nca dhammaana.m anantarapaccayena paccayo. manodhaatu ta.msampayuttakaa ca dhammaa manovi~n~naa.nadhaatuyaa ta.msampayuttakaana~nca dhammaana.m anantarapaccayena paccayo.

[03] ghaanavi~n~naa.nadhaatu ^a^M1.0003^ea^ ta.msampayuttakaa ca dhammaa manodhaatuyaa ta.msampayuttakaana~nca dhammaana.m anantarapaccayena paccayo. manodhaatu ta.msampayuttakaa ca dhammaa manovi~n~naa.nadhaatuyaa ta.msampayuttakaana~nca dhammaana.m anantarapaccayena paccayo.

[03] jivhaavi~n~naa.nadhaatu ta.msampayuttakaa ca dhammaa manodhaatuyaa ta.msampayuttakaana~nca dhammaana.m anantarapaccayena paccayo. manodhaatu ta.msampayuttakaa ca dhammaa manovi~n~naa.nadhaatuyaa ta.msampayuttakaana~nca dhammaana.m anantarapaccayena paccayo.

[03] kaayavi~n~naa.nadhaatu ta.msampayuttakaa ca dhammaa manodhaatuyaa ta.msampayuttakaana~nca dhammaana.m anantarapaccayena paccayo. manodhaatu ta.msampayuttakaa ca dhammaa manovi~n~naa.nadhaatuyaa ta.msampayuttakaana~nca dhammaana.m anantarapaccayena paccayo.

[03] purimaa purimaa kusalaa dhammaa pacchimaana.m pacchimaana.m kusalaana.m dhammaana.m anantarapaccayena paccayo. purimaa purimaa kusalaa dhammaa pacchimaana.m pacchimaana.m ^a^T1.0004^ea^ abyaakataana.m dhammaana.m anantarapaccayena paccayo.

[03] purimaa purimaa akusalaa dhammaa pacchimaana.m pacchimaana.m akusalaana.m dhammaana.m anantarapaccayena paccayo. purimaa purimaa akusalaa dhammaa pacchimaana.m pacchimaana.m abyaakataana.m dhammaana.m anantarapaccayena paccayo.

[03] purimaa purimaa abyaakataa dhammaa pacchimaana.m pacchimaana.m abyaakataana.m dhammaana.m anantarapaccayena paccayo. purimaa purimaa abyaakataa dhammaa pacchimaana.m pacchimaana.m kusalaana.m dhammaana.m anantarapaccayena paccayo. purimaa purimaa abyaakataa dhammaa pacchimaana.m pacchimaana.m akusalaana.m dhammaana.m anantarapaccayena paccayo.
[03] yesa.m ^a^V1.0004^ea^ yesa.m dhammaana.m anantaraa ye ye dhammaa uppajjanti cittacetasikaa dhammaa, te te dhammaa tesa.m tesa.m dhammaana.m anantarapaccayena paccayo.

[03] 5^b^.^eb^ ^b^samanantarapaccayo^eb^ti -- cakkhuvi~n~naa.nadhaatu ta.msampayuttakaa ca dhammaa manodhaatuyaa ta.msampayuttakaana~nca dhammaana.m samanantarapaccayena paccayo. manodhaatu ta.msampayuttakaa ca dhammaa manovi~n~naa.nadhaatuyaa ta.msampayuttakaana~nca dhammaana.m samanantarapaccayena paccayo.

[03] sotavi~n~naa.nadhaatu ^a^M1.0004^ea^ ta.msampayuttakaa ca dhammaa manodhaatuyaa ta.msampayuttakaana~nca dhammaana.m samanantarapaccayena paccayo. manodhaatu ta.msampayuttakaa ca dhammaa manovi~n~naa.nadhaatuyaa ta.msampayuttakaana~nca dhammaana.m samanantarapaccayena paccayo.

[03] ghaa.navi~n~naa.nadhaatu ta.msampayuttakaa ca dhammaa manodhaatuyaa ta.msampayuttakaana~nca dhammaana.m samanantarapaccayena paccayo ^a^T1.0005^ea^. manodhaatu ta.msampayuttakaa ca dhammaa manovi~n~naa.nadhaatuyaa ta.msampayuttakaana~nca dhammaana.m samanantarapaccayena paccayo.

[03] jivhaavi~n~naa.nadhaatu ta.msampayuttakaa ca dhammaa manodhaatuyaa ta.msampayuttakaana~nca dhammaana.m samanantarapaccayena paccayo. manodhaatu ta.msampayuttakaa ca dhammaa manovi~n~naa.nadhaatuyaa ta.msampayuttakaana~nca dhammaana.m samanantarapaccayena paccayo.

[03] kaayavi~n~naa.nadhaatu ta.msampayuttakaa ca dhammaa manodhaatuyaa ta.msampayuttakaana~nca dhammaana.m samanantarapaccayena paccayo. manodhaatu ta.msampayuttakaa ca dhammaa manovi~n~naa.nadhaatuyaa ta.msampayuttakaana~nca dhammaana.m samanantarapaccayena paccayo.

[03] purimaa purimaa kusalaa dhammaa pacchimaana.m pacchimaana.m kusalaana.m dhammaana.m samanantarapaccayena paccayo. purimaa purimaa kusalaa dhammaa pacchimaana.m pacchimaana.m abyaakataana.m dhammaana.m samanantarapaccayena paccayo.

[03] purimaa purimaa akusalaa dhammaa pacchimaana.m pacchimaana.m akusalaana.m dhammaana.m samanantarapaccayena ^a^V1.0005^ea^ paccayo. purimaa purimaa akusalaa dhammaa pacchimaana.m pacchimaana.m abyaakataana.m dhammaana.m samanantarapaccayena paccayo.

[03] purimaa purimaa abyaakataa dhammaa pacchimaana.m pacchimaana.m abyaakataana.m dhammaana.m samanantarapaccayena paccayo. purimaa purimaa abyaakataa dhammaa pacchimaana.m pacchimaana.m kusalaana.m dhammaana.m samanantarapaccayena paccayo. purimaa purimaa abyaakataa dhammaa pacchimaana.m pacchimaana.m akusalaana.m dhammaana.m samanantarapaccayena paccayo.
[03] yesa.m ^a^T1.0006^ea^ yesa.m dhammaana.m samanantaraa ye ye dhammaa uppajjanti cittacetasikaa dhammaa, te te dhammaa tesa.m tesa.m dhammaana.m samanantarapaccayena paccayo.

[03] 6^b^.^eb^ ^b^sahajaatapaccayo^eb^ti ^a^M1.0005^ea^ -- cattaaro khandhaa aruupino a~n~nama~n~na.m sahajaatapaccayena paccayo. cattaaro mahaabhuutaa a~n~nama~n~na.m sahajaatapaccayena paccayo. okkantikkha.ne naamaruupa.m a~n~nama~n~na.m sahajaatapaccayena paccayo. cittacetasikaa dhammaa cittasamu.t.thaanaana.m ruupaana.m sahajaatapaccayena paccayo. mahaabhuutaa upaadaaruupaana.m sahajaatapaccayena paccayo. ruupino dhammaa aruupiina.m dhammaana.m ki~nci kaale {ka~nci kaala.m (syaa0)} sahajaatapaccayena paccayo, ki~nci kaale na sahajaatapaccayena paccayo.

[03] 7^b^.^eb^ ^b^a~n~nama~n~napaccayo^eb^ti -- cattaaro khandhaa aruupino a~n~nama~n~napaccayena paccayo. cattaaro mahaabhuutaa a~n~nama~n~napaccayena paccayo. okkantikkha.ne naamaruupa.m a~n~nama~n~napaccayena paccayo.

[03] 8^b^.^eb^ ^b^nissayapaccayo^eb^ti -- cattaaro khandhaa aruupino a~n~nama~n~na.m nissayapaccayena paccayo. cattaaro mahaabhuutaa a~n~nama~n~na.m nissayapaccayena paccayo. okkantikkha.ne naamaruupa.m a~n~nama~n~na.m nissayapaccayena paccayo. cittacetasikaa dhammaa cittasamu.t.thaanaana.m ruupaana.m nissayapaccayena paccayo. mahaabhuutaa upaadaaruupaana.m nissayapaccayena paccayo.

[03] cakkhaayatana.m cakkhuvi~n~naa.nadhaatuyaa ta.msampayuttakaana~nca dhammaana.m ^a^T1.0007^ea^ nissayapaccayena ^a^V1.0006^ea^ paccayo. sotaayatana.m sotavi~n~naa.nadhaatuyaa ta.msampayuttakaana~nca dhammaana.m nissayapaccayena paccayo. ghaanaayatana.m ghaanavi~n~naa.nadhaatuyaa ta.msampayuttakaana~nca dhammaana.m nissayapaccayena paccayo. jivhaayatana.m jivhaavi~n~naa.nadhaatuyaa ta.msampayuttakaana~nca dhammaana.m nissayapaccayena paccayo. kaayaayatana.m kaayavi~n~naa.nadhaatuyaa ta.msampayuttakaana~nca dhammaana.m nissayapaccayena paccayo. ya.m ruupa.m nissaaya manodhaatu ca manovi~n~naa.nadhaatu ca vattanti, ta.m ruupa.m manodhaatuyaa ca manovi~n~naa.nadhaatuyaa ca ta.msampayuttakaana~nca dhammaana.m nissayapaccayena paccayo.

[03] 9^b^.^eb^ ^b^upanissayapaccayo^eb^ti -- purimaa purimaa kusalaa dhammaa pacchimaana.m pacchimaana.m kusalaana.m dhammaana.m upanissayapaccayena paccayo. purimaa purimaa kusalaa ^a^M1.0006^ea^ dhammaa pacchimaana.m pacchimaana.m akusalaana.m dhammaana.m kesa~nci upanissayapaccayena paccayo. purimaa purimaa kusalaa dhammaa pacchimaana.m pacchimaana.m abyaakataana.m dhammaana.m upanissayapaccayena paccayo.

[03] purimaa purimaa akusalaa dhammaa pacchimaana.m pacchimaana.m akusalaana.m dhammaana.m upanissayapaccayena paccayo. purimaa purimaa akusalaa dhammaa pacchimaana.m pacchimaana.m kusalaana.m dhammaana.m kesa~nci upanissayapaccayena paccayo. purimaa purimaa akusalaa dhammaa pacchimaana.m pacchimaana.m abyaakataana.m dhammaana.m upanissayapaccayena paccayo.

[03] purimaa purimaa abyaakataa dhammaa pacchimaana.m pacchimaana.m abyaakataana.m dhammaana.m upanissayapaccayena paccayo ^a^T1.0008^ea^. purimaa purimaa abyaakataa dhammaa pacchimaana.m pacchimaana.m kusalaana.m dhammaana.m upanissayapaccayena paccayo. purimaa purimaa abyaakataa dhammaa pacchimaana.m pacchimaana.m akusalaana.m dhammaana.m upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
[03] utubhojanampi upanissayapaccayena paccayo. puggalopi upanissayapaccayena paccayo. senaasanampi upanissayapaccayena paccayo.

[03] 10^b^.^eb^ ^b^purejaatapaccayo^eb^ti -- cakkhaayatana.m cakkhuvi~n~naa.nadhaatuyaa ta.msampayuttakaana~nca dhammaana.m purejaatapaccayena paccayo. sotaayatana.m sotavi~n~naa.nadhaatuyaa ta.msampayuttakaana~nca dhammaana.m purejaatapaccayena paccayo. ghaanaayatana.m ghaanavi~n~naa.nadhaatuyaa ta.msampayuttakaana~nca dhammaana.m purejaatapaccayena ^a^V1.0007^ea^ paccayo. jivhaayatana.m jivhaavi~n~naa.nadhaatuyaa ta.msampayuttakaana~nca dhammaana.m purejaatapaccayena paccayo. kaayaayatana.m kaayavi~n~naa.nadhaatuyaa ta.msampayuttakaana~nca dhammaana.m purejaatapaccayena paccayo.

[03] ruupaayatana.m cakkhuvi~n~naa.nadhaatuyaa ta.msampayuttakaana~nca dhammaana.m purejaatapaccayena paccayo. saddaayatana.m sotavi~n~naa.nadhaatuyaa ta.msampayuttakaana~nca dhammaana.m purejaatapaccayena paccayo. gandhaayatana.m ghaanavi~n~naa.nadhaatuyaa ta.msampayuttakaana~nca dhammaana.m purejaatapaccayena paccayo. rasaayatana.m jivhaavi~n~naa.nadhaatuyaa ta.msampayuttakaana~nca dhammaana.m purejaatapaccayena paccayo. pho.t.thabbaayatana.m kaayavi~n~naa.nadhaatuyaa ta.msampayuttakaana~nca dhammaana.m purejaatapaccayena paccayo. ruupaayatana.m ^a^M1.0007^ea^ saddaayatana.m gandhaayatana.m rasaayatana.m pho.t.thabbaayatana.m manodhaatuyaa ta.msampayuttakaana~nca dhammaana.m purejaatapaccayena paccayo.

[03] ya.m ruupa.m nissaaya manodhaatu ca manovi~n~naa.nadhaatu ^a^T1.0009^ea^ ca vattanti, ta.m ruupa.m manodhaatuyaa ta.msampayuttakaana~nca dhammaana.m purejaatapaccayena paccayo. manovi~n~naa.nadhaatuyaa ta.msampayuttakaana~nca dhammaana.m ki~nci kaale purejaatapaccayena paccayo, ki~nci kaale na purejaatapaccayena paccayo.
[03] 11^b^.^eb^ ^b^pacchaajaatapaccayo^eb^ti -- pacchaajaataa cittacetasikaa dhammaa purejaatassa imassa kaayassa pacchaajaatapaccayena paccayo.

[03] 12^b^.^eb^ ^b^aasevanapaccayo^eb^ti -- purimaa purimaa kusalaa dhammaa pacchimaana.m pacchimaana.m kusalaana.m dhammaana.m aasevanapaccayena paccayo. purimaa purimaa akusalaa dhammaa pacchimaana.m pacchimaana.m akusalaana.m dhammaana.m aasevanapaccayena paccayo. purimaa purimaa kiriyaabyaakataa dhammaa pacchimaana.m pacchimaana.m kiriyaabyaakataana.m dhammaana.m aasevanapaccayena paccayo.

[03] 13^b^.^eb^ ^b^kammapaccayo^eb^ti -- kusalaakusala.m kamma.m vipaakaana.m khandhaana.m ka.tattaa ca ruupaana.m kammapaccayena paccayo. cetanaa sampayuttakaana.m dhammaana.m ta.msamu.t.thaanaana~nca ruupaana.m kammapaccayena paccayo.
[03] 14^b^.^eb^ ^b^vipaakapaccayo^eb^ti ^a^V1.0008^ea^ -- vipaakaa cattaaro khandhaa aruupino a~n~nama~n~na.m vipaakapaccayena paccayo.

[03] 15^b^.^eb^ ^b^aahaarapaccayo^eb^ti -- kaba.liikaaro {kaba.li"nkaaro (ka0 sii0 syaa0)} aahaaro imassa kaayassa aahaarapaccayena paccayo. aruupino aahaaraa sampayuttakaana.m dhammaana.m ta.msamu.t.thaanaana~nca ruupaana.m aahaarapaccayena paccayo.

[03] 16^b^.^eb^ ^b^indriyapaccayo^eb^ti ^a^T1.0010^ea^ -- cakkhundriya.m cakkhuvi~n~naa.nadhaatuyaa ta.msampayuttakaana~nca dhammaana.m indriyapaccayena paccayo. sotindriya.m sotavi~n~naa.nadhaatuyaa ta.msampayuttakaana~nca dhammaana.m indriyapaccayena paccayo. ghaanindriya.m ^a^M1.0008^ea^ ghaanavi~n~naa.nadhaatuyaa ta.msampayuttakaana~nca dhammaana.m indriyapaccayena paccayo. jivhindriya.m jivhaavi~n~naa.nadhaatuyaa ta.msampayuttakaana~nca dhammaana.m indriyapaccayena paccayo. kaayindriya.m kaayavi~n~naa.nadhaatuyaa ta.msampayuttakaana~nca dhammaana.m indriyapaccayena paccayo. ruupajiivitindriya.m ka.tattaaruupaana.m indriyapaccayena paccayo.
[03] aruupino indriyaa sampayuttakaana.m dhammaana.m ta.msamu.t.thaanaana~nca ruupaana.m indriyapaccayena paccayo.
[03] 17^b^.^eb^ ^b^jhaanapaccayo^eb^ti -- jhaana"ngaani jhaanasampayuttakaana.m dhammaana.m ta.msamu.t.thaanaana~nca ruupaana.m jhaanapaccayena paccayo.
[03] 18^b^.^eb^ ^b^maggapaccayo^eb^ti -- magga"ngaani maggasampayuttakaana.m dhammaana.m ta.msamu.t.thaanaana~nca ruupaana.m maggapaccayena paccayo.
[03] 19^b^.^eb^ ^b^sampayuttapaccayo^eb^ti -- cattaaro khandhaa aruupino a~n~nama~n~na.m sampayuttapaccayena paccayo.
[03] 20^b^.^eb^ ^b^vippayuttapaccayo^eb^ti -- ruupino dhammaa aruupiina.m dhammaana.m vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. aruupino dhammaa ruupiina.m dhammaana.m vippayuttapaccayena paccayo.

[03] 21^b^.^eb^ ^b^atthipaccayo^eb^ti ^a^T1.0011^ea^ ^a^V1.0009^ea^ -- cattaaro khandhaa aruupino a~n~nama~n~na.m atthipaccayena paccayo. cattaaro mahaabhuutaa a~n~nama~n~na.m atthipaccayena paccayo. okkantikkha.ne naamaruupa.m a~n~nama~n~na.m atthipaccayena paccayo. cittacetasikaa dhammaa cittasamu.t.thaanaana.m ruupaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo. mahaabhuutaa upaadaaruupaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo.

[03] cakkhaayatana.m cakkhuvi~n~naa.nadhaatuyaa ta.msampayuttakaana~nca dhammaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo. sotaayatana.m sotavi~n~naa.nadhaatuyaa ta.msampayuttakaana~nca dhammaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo. ghaanaayatana.m ghaanavi~n~naa.nadhaatuyaa ta.msampayuttakaana~nca dhammaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo. jivhaayatana.m jivhaavi~n~naa.nadhaatuyaa ta.msampayuttakaana~nca dhammaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo. kaayaayatana.m kaayavi~n~naa.nadhaatuyaa ta.msampayuttakaana~nca dhammaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo.

[03] ruupaayatana.m ^a^M1.0009^ea^ cakkhuvi~n~naa.nadhaatuyaa ta.msampayuttakaana~nca dhammaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo. saddaayatana.m sotavi~n~naa.nadhaatuyaa ta.msampayuttakaana~nca dhammaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo. gandhaayatana.m ghaanavi~n~naa.nadhaatuyaa ta.msampayuttakaana~nca dhammaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo. rasaayatana.m jivhaavi~n~naa.nadhaatuyaa ta.msampayuttakaana~nca dhammaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo. pho.t.thabbaayatana.m kaayavi~n~naa.nadhaatuyaa ta.msampayuttakaana~nca dhammaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo. ruupaayatana.m saddaayatana.m gandhaayatana.m rasaayatana.m pho.t.thabbaayatana.m manodhaatuyaa ta.msampayuttakaana~nca dhammaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo.

[03] ya.m ruupa.m nissaaya manodhaatu ca manovi~n~naa.nadhaatu ^a^T1.0012^ea^ ca vattanti, ta.m ruupa.m manodhaatuyaa ca manovi~n~naa.nadhaatuyaa ca ta.msampayuttakaana~nca dhammaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo.
[03] 22^b^.^eb^ ^b^natthipaccayo^eb^ti -- samanantaraniruddhaa cittacetasikaa dhammaa pa.tuppannaana.m cittacetasikaana.m dhammaana.m natthipaccayena paccayo.
[03] 23^b^.^eb^ ^b^vigatapaccayo^eb^ti -- samanantaravigataa cittacetasikaa dhammaa pa.tuppannaana.m cittacetasikaana.m dhammaana.m vigatapaccayena paccayo.

[03] 24^b^.^eb^ ^b^avigatapaccayo^eb^ti ^a^V1.0010^ea^ -- cattaaro khandhaa aruupino a~n~nama~n~na.m avigatapaccayena paccayo. cattaaro mahaabhuutaa a~n~nama~n~na.m avigatapaccayena paccayo ^a^T1.0013^ea^. okkantikkha.ne naamaruupa.m a~n~nama~n~na.m avigatapaccayena paccayo. cittacetasikaa dhammaa cittasamu.t.thaanaana.m ruupaana.m avigatapaccayena paccayo. mahaabhuutaa upaadaaruupaana.m avigatapaccayena paccayo.

[03] cakkhaayatana.m cakkhuvi~n~naa.nadhaatuyaa ta.msampayuttakaana~nca dhammaana.m avigatapaccayena paccayo. sotaayatana.m sotavi~n~naa.nadhaatuyaa ta.msampayuttakaana~nca dhammaana.m avigatapaccayena paccayo. ghaanaayatana.m ghaanavi~n~naa.nadhaatuyaa ta.msampayuttakaana~nca dhammaana.m avigatapaccayena paccayo. jivhaayatana.m jivhaavi~n~naa.nadhaatuyaa ta.msampayuttakaana~nca dhammaana.m avigatapaccayena paccayo. kaayaayatana.m kaayavi~n~naa.nadhaatuyaa ta.msampayuttakaana~nca dhammaana.m avigatapaccayena paccayo.

[03] ruupaayatana.m ^a^M1.0010^ea^ cakkhuvi~n~naa.nadhaatuyaa ta.msampayuttakaana~nca dhammaana.m avigatapaccayena paccayo. saddaayatana.m sotavi~n~naa.nadhaatuyaa ta.msampayuttakaana~nca dhammaana.m avigatapaccayena paccayo. gandhaayatana.m ghaanavi~n~naa.nadhaatuyaa ta.msampayuttakaana~nca dhammaana.m avigatapaccayena paccayo. rasaayatana.m jivhaavi~n~naa.nadhaatuyaa ta.msampayuttakaana~nca dhammaana.m avigatapaccayena paccayo. pho.t.thabbaayatana.m kaayavi~n~naa.nadhaatuyaa ta.msampayuttakaana~nca dhammaana.m avigatapaccayena paccayo. ruupaayatana.m saddaayatana.m gandhaayatana.m rasaayatana.m pho.t.thabbaayatana.m manodhaatuyaa ta.msampayuttakaana~nca dhammaana.m avigatapaccayena paccayo.
[03] ya.m ruupa.m nissaaya manodhaatu ca manovi~n~naa.nadhaatu ca vattanti, ta.m ruupa.m manodhaatuyaa ca manovi~n~naa.nadhaatuyaa ca ta.msampayuttakaana~nca dhammaana.m avigatapaccayena paccayo.

[03] 25^b^.^eb^ siyaa ^a^T1.0014^ea^ ^a^V1.0011^ea^ kusala.m dhamma.m pa.ticca kusalo dhammo uppajjeyya hetupaccayaa. siyaa kusala.m dhamma.m pa.ticca akusalo dhammo uppajjeyya hetupaccayaa. siyaa kusala.m dhamma.m pa.ticca abyaakato dhammo uppajjeyya hetupaccayaa. siyaa kusala.m dhamma.m pa.ticca kusalo ca abyaakato ca dhammaa uppajjeyyu.m hetupaccayaa. siyaa kusala.m dhamma.m pa.ticca akusalo ca abyaakato ca dhammaa uppajjeyyu.m hetupaccayaa. siyaa kusala.m dhamma.m pa.ticca kusalo ca akusalo ca dhammaa uppajjeyyu.m hetupaccayaa. siyaa kusala.m dhamma.m pa.ticca kusalo ca akusalo ca abyaakato ca dhammaa uppajjeyyu.m hetupaccayaa.

[03] 27^b^.^eb^ siyaa abyaakata.m dhamma.m pa.ticca abyaakato dhammo uppajjeyya hetupaccayaa. siyaa abyaakata.m ^a^V1.0012^ea^ dhamma.m pa.ticca kusalo dhammo uppajjeyya hetupaccayaa. siyaa abyaakata.m dhamma.m pa.ticca akusalo dhammo uppajjeyya hetupaccayaa. siyaa abyaakata.m dhamma.m pa.ticca kusalo ca abyaakato ca dhammaa uppajjeyyu.m hetupaccayaa. siyaa abyaakata.m dhamma.m pa.ticca akusalo ca abyaakato ca dhammaa uppajjeyyu.m hetupaccayaa. siyaa abyaakata.m dhamma.m pa.ticca kusalo ca akusalo ca dhammaa uppajjeyyu.m hetupaccayaa. siyaa abyaakata.m dhamma.m pa.ticca kusalo ca akusalo ca abyaakato ca dhammaa uppajjeyyu.m hetupaccayaa.

[03] 28^b^.^eb^ siyaa kusala~nca abyaakata~nca dhamma.m pa.ticca kusalo dhammo uppajjeyya hetupaccayaa. siyaa kusala~nca abyaakata~nca dhamma.m pa.ticca akusalo dhammo uppajjeyya hetupaccayaa. siyaa kusala~nca abyaakata~nca dhamma.m pa.ticca abyaakato dhammo uppajjeyya hetupaccayaa. siyaa kusala~nca abyaakata~nca dhamma.m pa.ticca kusalo ca abyaakato ca dhammaa uppajjeyyu.m hetupaccayaa. siyaa kusala~nca abyaakata~nca ^a^T1.0016^ea^ dhamma.m pa.ticca akusalo ca abyaakato ca dhammaa uppajjeyyu.m hetupaccayaa. siyaa kusala~nca abyaakata~nca dhamma.m pa.ticca kusalo ca akusalo ca dhammaa uppajjeyyu.m hetupaccayaa. siyaa kusala~nca abyaakata~nca dhamma.m pa.ticca kusalo ca akusalo ca abyaakato ca dhammaa uppajjeyyu.m hetupaccayaa.

[03] 32^b^.^eb^ siyaa kusala.m dhamma.m pa.ticca kusalo dhammo uppajjeyya aaramma.napaccayaa ^a^T1.0018^ea^.

[03] 33^b^.^eb^ siyaa ^a^V1.0014^ea^ kusala.m dhamma.m pa.ticca kusalo dhammo uppajjeyya adhipatipaccayaa... anantarapaccayaa... samanantarapaccayaa... sahajaatapaccayaa... a~n~nama~n~napaccayaa... nissayapaccayaa... upanissayapaccayaa... purejaatapaccayaa... pacchaajaatapaccayaa... aasevanapaccayaa... kammapaccayaa... vipaakapaccayaa... aahaarapaccayaa... indriyapaccayaa... jhaanapaccayaa... maggapaccayaa... sampayuttapaccayaa... vippayuttapaccayaa... atthipaccayaa... natthipaccayaa... vigatapaccayaa.

[03] 34^b^.^eb^ siyaa kusala.m dhamma.m pa.ticca kusalo dhammo uppajjeyya avigatapaccayaa...pe0... akusala.m dhamma.m pa.ticca... abyaakata.m dhamma.m pa.ticca... kusala~nca abyaakata~nca dhamma.m pa.ticca... akusala~nca abyaakata~nca dhamma.m pa.ticca... kusala~nca akusala~nca dhamma.m pa.ticca... kusala~nca akusala~nca abyaakata~nca dhamma.m pa.ticca kusalo dhammo uppajjeyya... akusalo dhammo uppajjeyya... abyaakato dhammo uppajjeyya... kusalo ca abyaakato ca dhammaa uppajjeyyu.m... akusalo ^a^M1.0014^ea^ ca abyaakato ca dhammaa uppajjeyyu.m... kusalo ca akusalo ca dhammaa uppajjeyyu.m... kusalo ca akusalo ca abyaakato ca dhammaa uppajjeyyu.m avigatapaccayaa.
[03] (yathaa hetupaccayo vitthaarito, eva.m avigatapaccayopi vitthaaretabbo vaacanaamaggena.)

[03] 53^b^.^eb^ kusala.m ^a^M1.0019^ea^ dhamma.m pa.ticca kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayaa -- kusala.m eka.m khandha.m pa.ticca tayo khandhaa, tayo khandhe pa.ticca eko khandho, dve khandhe pa.ticca dve khandhaa. kusala.m dhamma.m pa.ticca abyaakato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayaa -- kusale khandhe pa.ticca cittasamu.t.thaana.m ruupa.m. kusala.m dhamma.m pa.ticca kusalo ca abyaakato ca dhammaa uppajjanti hetupaccayaa -- kusala.m eka.m khandha.m pa.ticca tayo khandhaa cittasamu.t.thaana~nca ruupa.m, tayo khandhe pa.ticca eko ^a^T1.0025^ea^ khandho cittasamu.t.thaana~nca ruupa.m, dve khandhe pa.ticca dve khandhaa cittasamu.t.thaana~nca ruupa.m. (3)

[03] 231^b^.^eb^ novigatapaccayaa nahetupaccayaa...pe0... nakammapaccayaa sahajaate eka.m, nissaye eka.m, aahaare eka.m, atthiyaa eka.m, avigate eka.m...pe0....
[03] 232^b^.^eb^ novigatapaccayaa nahetupaccayaa...pe0... nakammapaccayaa navipaakapaccayaa naaahaarapaccayaa sahajaate eka.m, nissaye eka.m, atthiyaa eka.m, avigate eka.m...pe0....

[03] 233^b^.^eb^ novigatapaccayaa nahetupaccayaa...pe0... nakammapaccayaa navipaakapaccayaa naaahaarapaccayaa naindriyapaccayaa najhaanapaccayaa namaggapaccayaa nasampayuttapaccayaa navippayuttapaccayaa nonatthipaccayaa sahajaate eka.m, nissaye eka.m, atthiyaa eka.m, avigate eka.m.
[06] paccaniiyaanuloma.m.
[06] pa.ticcavaaro.

[03] 234^b^.^eb^ kusala.m ^a^V1.0075^ea^ ^a^M1.0066^ea^ dhamma.m sahajaato kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayaa -- kusala.m eka.m khandha.m sahajaataa tayo khandhaa, tayo khandhe sahajaato eko khandho, dve khandhe sahajaataa dve khandhaa. kusala.m dhamma.m sahajaato abyaakato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayaa -- kusale khandhe sahajaata.m cittasamu.t.thaana.m ruupa.m. kusala.m dhamma.m sahajaato kusalo ^a^T1.0081^ea^ ca abyaakato ca dhammaa uppajjanti hetupaccayaa -- kusala.m eka.m khandha.m sahajaataa tayo khandhaa cittasamu.t.thaana~nca ruupa.m, tayo khandhe sahajaato eko khandho cittasamu.t.thaana~nca ruupa.m, dve khandhe sahajaataa dve khandhaa cittasamu.t.thaana~nca ruupa.m. (3)

[03] 235^b^.^eb^ akusala.m dhamma.m sahajaato akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayaa -- akusala.m eka.m khandha.m sahajaataa tayo khandhaa, tayo khandhe sahajaato eko khandho, dve khandhe sahajaataa dve khandhaa. akusala.m dhamma.m sahajaato abyaakato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayaa -- akusale khandhe sahajaata.m cittasamu.t.thaana.m ruupa.m. akusala.m dhamma.m sahajaato akusalo ca abyaakato ca dhammaa uppajjanti hetupaccayaa -- akusala.m eka.m khandha.m sahajaataa tayo khandhaa cittasamu.t.thaana~nca ruupa.m, tayo khandhe sahajaato eko khandho cittasamu.t.thaana~nca ruupa.m, dve khandhe sahajaataa dve khandhaa cittasamu.t.thaana~nca ruupa.m. (3)

[03] 236^b^.^eb^ abyaakata.m dhamma.m sahajaato abyaakato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayaa -- vipaakaabyaakata.m kiriyaabyaakata.m eka.m khandha.m sahajaataa tayo khandhaa cittasamu.t.thaana~nca ruupa.m, tayo khandhe sahajaato eko khandho cittasamu.t.thaana~nca ruupa.m, dve khandhe sahajaataa dve khandhaa cittasamu.t.thaana~nca ruupa.m; pa.tisandhikkha.ne vipaakaabyaakata.m eka.m khandha.m sahajaataa tayo khandhaa ka.tattaa ca ruupa.m, tayo khandhe sahajaato eko khandho ka.tattaa ca ruupa.m, dve khandhe sahajaataa dve khandhaa ^a^V1.0076^ea^ ka.tattaa ^a^T1.0082^ea^ ca ruupa.m; khandhe sahajaata.m vatthu, vatthu.m sahajaataa ^a^M1.0067^ea^ khandhaa; eka.m mahaabhuuta.m sahajaataa tayo mahaabhuutaa, tayo mahaabhuute sahajaata.m eka.m mahaabhuuta.m, dve mahaabhuute sahajaataa dve mahaabhuutaa, mahaabhuute sahajaata.m cittasamu.t.thaana.m ruupa.m ka.tattaaruupa.m upaadaaruupa.m. (1)
[03] 237^b^.^eb^ kusala~nca abyaakata~nca dhamma.m sahajaato abyaakato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayaa -- kusale khandhe ca mahaabhuute ca sahajaata.m cittasamu.t.thaana.m ruupa.m. (1)
[03] akusala~nca abyaakata~nca dhamma.m sahajaato abyaakato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayaa -- akusale khandhe ca mahaabhuute ca sahajaata.m cittasamu.t.thaana.m ruupa.m. (1)
[03] (yathaa pa.ticcavaare eva.m vitthaaretabba.m.)

[03] 238^b^.^eb^ hetuyaa nava, aaramma.ne tii.ni, adhipatiyaa nava, anantare tii.ni, samanantare tii.ni, sahajaate nava, a~n~nama~n~ne tii.ni, nissaye nava, upanissaye tii.ni, purejaate tii.ni, aasevane tii.ni, kamme nava, vipaake eka.m, aahaare nava, indriye nava, jhaane nava, magge nava, sampayutte tii.ni, vippayutte nava, atthiyaa nava, natthiyaa tii.ni, vigate tii.ni, avigate nava.
[03] (yathaa pa.ticcavaaraga.nanaa, eva.m ga.netabba.m.)

[03] 239^b^.^eb^ akusala.m ^a^V1.0077^ea^ dhamma.m sahajaato akusalo dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayaa -- vicikicchaasahagate uddhaccasahagate khandhe sahajaato vicikicchaasahagato ^a^T1.0083^ea^ uddhaccasahagato moho. (1)

[01] abyaakata.m ^a^M1.0068^ea^ dhamma.m sahajaato abyaakato dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayaa -- ahetuka.m vipaakaabyaakata.m kiriyaabyaakata.m eka.m khandha.m sahajaataa tayo khandhaa cittasamu.t.thaana~nca ruupa.m, tayo khandhe sahajaato eko khandho cittasamu.t.thaana~nca ruupa.m, dve khandhe sahajaataa dve khandhaa cittasamu.t.thaana~nca ruupa.m; ahetukapa.tisandhikkha.ne vipaakaabyaakata.m eka.m khandha.m sahajaataa tayo khandhaa ka.tattaa ca ruupa.m, tayo khandhe sahajaato eko khandho ka.tattaa ca ruupa.m, dve khandhe sahajaataa dve khandhaa ka.tattaa ca ruupa.m, khandhe sahajaata.m vatthu, vatthu.m sahajaataa khandhaa; eka.m mahaabhuuta.m sahajaataa tayo mahaabhuutaa, tayo mahaabhuute sahajaata.m eka.m mahaabhuuta.m, dve mahaabhuute sahajaataa dve mahaabhuutaa, mahaabhuute sahajaata.m cittasamu.t.thaana.m ruupa.m ka.tattaaruupa.m upaadaaruupa.m; baahira.m... aahaarasamu.t.thaana.m... utusamu.t.thaana.m... asa~n~nasattaana.m eka.m mahaabhuuta.m sahajaataa tayo mahaabhuutaa...pe0... mahaabhuute sahajaata.m ka.tattaaruupa.m upaadaaruupa.m. (1)
[03] (yathaa pa.ticcavaare, eva.m vitthaaretabba.m.)

[03] 240^b^.^eb^ nahetuyaa dve, naaaramma.ne pa~nca, naadhipatiyaa nava, naanantare pa~nca, nasamanantare ^a^V1.0078^ea^ pa~nca, naa~n~nama~n~ne pa~nca, naupanissaye pa~nca, napurejaate satta, napacchaajaate nava, naaasevane nava, nakamme tii.ni, navipaake nava, naaahaare eka.m, naindriye ^a^T1.0084^ea^ eka.m, najhaane eka.m, namagge eka.m, nasampayutte pa~nca, navippayutte tii.ni, nonatthiyaa pa~nca, novigate pa~nca.
[06] paccaniiya.m.

[03] 241^b^.^eb^ hetupaccayaa naaaramma.ne pa~nca, naadhipatiyaa nava, naanantare pa~nca, nasamanantare pa~nca, naa~n~nama~n~ne pa~nca, naupanissaye pa~nca, napurejaate satta, napacchaajaate nava, naaasevane nava, nakamme tii.ni, navipaake nava, nasampayutte pa~nca, navippayutte tii.ni, nonatthiyaa pa~nca, novigate pa~nca.
[06] anulomapaccaniiya.m.

[03] 242^b^.^eb^ nahetupaccayaa ^a^M1.0069^ea^ aaramma.ne dve, anantare dve, samanantare dve, sahajaate dve, a~n~nama~n~ne dve, nissaye dve, upanissaye dve, purejaate dve, aasevane dve, kamme dve, vipaake eka.m, aahaare dve, indriye dve, jhaane dve, magge eka.m, sampayutte dve, vippayutte dve, atthiyaa dve, natthiyaa dve, vigate dve, avigate dve.

[03] 243^b^.^eb^ kusala.m ^a^T1.0085^ea^ ^a^V1.0079^ea^ dhamma.m paccayaa kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayaa -- kusala.m eka.m khandha.m paccayaa tayo khandhaa, tayo khandhe paccayaa eko khandho, dve khandhe paccayaa dve khandhaa. kusala.m dhamma.m paccayaa abyaakato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayaa -- kusale khandhe paccayaa cittasamu.t.thaana.m ruupa.m. kusala.m dhamma.m paccayaa kusalo ca abyaakato ca dhammaa uppajjanti hetupaccayaa -- kusala.m eka.m khandha.m paccayaa tayo khandhaa cittasamu.t.thaana~nca ruupa.m, tayo khandhe paccayaa eko khandho cittasamu.t.thaana~nca ruupa.m, dve khandhe paccayaa dve khandhaa cittasamu.t.thaana~nca ruupa.m. (3)

[03] 329^b^.^eb^ kusala.m dhamma.m nissaaya kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayaa -- kusala.m eka.m khandha.m nissaaya tayo khandhaa, tayo khandhe nissaaya eko khandho, dve khandhe nissaaya dve khandhaa. kusala.m dhamma.m nissaaya abyaakato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayaa -- kusale khandhe nissaaya cittasamu.t.thaana.m ruupa.m. kusala.m dhamma.m nissaaya kusalo ca abyaakato ca dhammaa uppajjanti hetupaccayaa. kusala.m eka.m khandha.m nissaaya tayo khandhaa cittasamu.t.thaana~nca ruupa.m, tayo khandhe nissaaya eko khandho cittasamu.t.thaana~nca ruupa.m, dve khandhe nissaaya dve khandhaa cittasamu.t.thaana~nca ruupa.m. (3)

[03] najhaanapaccayaa ^a^M1.0128^ea^ nahetupaccayaa naadhipatipaccayaa napacchaajaatapaccayaa naaasevanapaccayaa namaggapaccayaa aaramma.ne eka.m, anantare eka.m, samanantare eka.m, sahajaate eka.m, a~n~nama~n~ne eka.m, nissaye eka.m, upanissaye eka.m, purejaate eka.m, kamme eka.m, vipaake eka.m, aahaare eka.m, indriye eka.m, sampayutte eka.m, vippayutte eka.m, atthiyaa eka.m, natthiyaa eka.m, vigate eka.m, avigate eka.m.

[03] namaggapaccayaa ^a^V1.0149^ea^ nahetupaccayaa naadhipatipaccayaa napurejaatapaccayaa aaramma.ne eka.m, anantare eka.m, samanantare eka.m, sahajaate eka.m, a~n~nama~n~ne eka.m, nissaye eka.m, upanissaye eka.m, kamme eka.m, vipaake eka.m, aahaare eka.m, indriye eka.m, jhaane eka.m, sampayutte eka.m, vippayutte eka.m, atthiyaa eka.m, natthiyaa eka.m, vigate eka.m, avigate eka.m.

[03] navippayuttapaccayaa ^a^M1.0129^ea^ nahetupaccayaa aaramma.ne dve, anantare dve, samanantare dve, sahajaate dve, a~n~nama~n~ne dve, nissaye dve, upanissaye dve, aasevane eka.m, kamme dve, aahaare dve, indriye dve, jhaane dve, magge eka.m, sampayutte dve, atthiyaa dve, natthiyaa dve, vigate dve, avigate dve...pe0....

[03] navippayuttapaccayaa ^a^T1.0151^ea^ nahetupaccayaa naadhipatipaccayaa napurejaatapaccayaa napacchaajaatapaccayaa (naaasevanapaccayamuulakampi ^a^V1.0150^ea^ nahetumuulakasadisa.m.) nakammapaccayaa navipaakapaccayaa namaggapaccayaa (imaani tii.ni muulaani ekasadisaani) aaramma.ne eka.m, anantare eka.m, samanantare eka.m, sahajaate eka.m, a~n~nama~n~ne eka.m, nissaye eka.m, upanissaye eka.m, aahaare eka.m, indriye eka.m, jhaane eka.m, sampayutte eka.m, atthiyaa eka.m, natthiyaa eka.m, vigate eka.m, avigate eka.m.
[06] paccaniiyaanuloma.m.
[06] sa.msa.t.thavaaro.

[03] 392^b^.^eb^ kusala.m dhamma.m sampayutto kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayaa -- kusala.m eka.m khandha.m sampayuttaa tayo khandhaa, tayo khandhe sampayutto eko khandho, dve khandhe sampayuttaa dve khandhaa. (1)

[03] 393^b^.^eb^ akusala.m dhamma.m sampayutto akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayaa -- akusala.m eka.m khandha.m sampayuttaa tayo khandhaa, tayo khandhe sampayutto eko khandho, dve khandhe sampayuttaa dve khandhaa. (1)

[03] 394^b^.^eb^ abyaakata.m ^a^M1.0130^ea^ dhamma.m sampayutto abyaakato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayaa -- vipaakaabyaakata.m kiriyaabyaakata.m eka.m khandha.m sampayuttaa tayo khandhaa, tayo khandhe sampayutto eko khandho, dve khandhe sampayuttaa ^a^T1.0152^ea^ dve khandhaa; pa.tisandhikkha.ne vipaakaabyaakata.m eka.m khandha.m sampayuttaa ^a^V1.0151^ea^ tayo khandhaa, tayo khandhe sampayutto eko khandho, dve khandhe sampayuttaa dve khandhaa. (sa.mkhitta.m.) (1)

[03] 395^b^.^eb^ hetuyaa tii.ni, aaramma.ne tii.ni, adhipatiyaa tii.ni, anantare tii.ni, samanantare tii.ni, sahajaate tii.ni, a~n~nama~n~ne tii.ni, nissaye tii.ni, upanissaye tii.ni, purejaate tii.ni, aasevane tii.ni, kamme tii.ni, vipaake eka.m, aahaare tii.ni, indriye tii.ni, jhaane tii.ni, magge tii.ni, sampayutte tii.ni, vippayutte tii.ni, atthiyaa tii.ni, natthiyaa tii.ni, vigate tii.ni, avigate tii.ni.
[06] anuloma.m.
[03] 396^b^.^eb^ akusala.m dhamma.m sampayutto akusalo dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayaa -- vicikicchaasahagate uddhaccasahagate khandhe sampayutto vicikicchaasahagato uddhaccasahagato moho. (1)

[03] 397^b^.^eb^ abyaakata.m dhamma.m sampayutto abyaakato dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayaa -- ahetuka.m vipaakaabyaakata.m kiriyaabyaakata.m eka.m khandha.m sampayuttaa tayo khandhaa, tayo khandhe sampayutto eko khandho, dve khandhe sampayuttaa dve khandhaa; ahetukapa.tisandhikkha.ne vipaakaabyaakata.m eka.m khandha.m sampayuttaa tayo khandhaa, tayo khandhe sampayutto eko khandho, dve khandhe sampayuttaa dve khandhaa. (sa.mkhitta.m.) (1)

[03] 398^b^.^eb^ nahetuyaa ^a^T1.0153^ea^ ^a^V1.0152^ea^ ^a^M1.0131^ea^ dve, naadhipatiyaa tii.ni, napurejaate tii.ni, napacchaajaate tii.ni, naaasevane tii.ni, nakamme tii.ni, navipaake tii.ni, najhaane eka.m, namagge eka.m, navippayutte tii.ni. (sa.mkhitta.m.)
[06] paccaniiya.m.
[03] 399^b^.^eb^ hetupaccayaa naadhipatiyaa tii.ni, napurejaate tii.ni, napacchaajaate tii.ni, naaasevane tii.ni, nakamme tii.ni, navipaake tii.ni, navippayutte tii.ni. (sa.mkhitta.m.)
[06] anulomapaccaniiya.m.

[03] 400^b^.^eb^ nahetupaccayaa aaramma.ne dve, anantare dve, samanantare dve, sahajaate dve, a~n~nama~n~ne dve, nissaye dve, upanissaye dve, purejaate dve, aasevane dve, kamme dve, vipaake eka.m ^a^V1.0153^ea^, aahaare dve, indriye dve, jhaane dve, magge eka.m, sampayutte dve, vippayutte dve, atthiyaa dve, natthiyaa dve, vigate dve, avigate dve. (sa.mkhitta.m.)
[06] paccaniiyaanuloma.m.
[06] sampayuttavaaro.
[03] (sa.msa.t.thatta.m naama sampayuttatta.m, sampayuttatta.m naama sa.msa.t.thatta.m.)

[03] 401^b^.^eb^ kusalo ^a^T1.0154^ea^ ^a^M1.0132^ea^ dhammo kusalassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo -- kusalaa hetuu sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m hetupaccayena paccayo. kusalo dhammo abyaakatassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo -- kusalaa hetuu cittasamu.t.thaanaana.m ruupaana.m hetupaccayena paccayo. kusalo dhammo kusalassa ca abyaakatassa ca dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo -- kusalaa hetuu sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m cittasamu.t.thaanaana~nca ruupaana.m hetupaccayena paccayo. (3)

[03] 402^b^.^eb^ akusalo dhammo akusalassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo -- akusalaa hetuu sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m hetupaccayena paccayo. akusalo dhammo abyaakatassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo -- akusalaa hetuu cittasamu.t.thaanaana.m ruupaana.m hetupaccayena paccayo. akusalo dhammo akusalassa ca abyaakatassa ca dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo -- akusalaa hetuu sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m cittasamu.t.thaanaana~nca ruupaana.m hetupaccayena paccayo. (3)

[03] 403^b^.^eb^ abyaakato dhammo abyaakatassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo -- vipaakaabyaakataa kiriyaabyaakataa hetuu sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m cittasamu.t.thaanaana~nca ruupaana.m hetupaccayena ^a^V1.0154^ea^ paccayo; pa.tisandhikkha.ne vipaakaabyaakataa hetuu sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m ka.tattaa ca ruupaana.m hetupaccayena ^a^T1.0155^ea^ paccayo. (1)

[03] 404^b^.^eb^ kusalo dhammo kusalassa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo -- daana.m datvaa siila.m samaadiyitvaa uposathakamma.m katvaa ta.m paccavekkhati, pubbe suci.n.naani paccavekkhati, jhaanaa vu.t.thahitvaa jhaana.m paccavekkhati, sekkhaa gotrabhu.m paccavekkhanti, vodaana.m paccavekkhanti, sekkhaa maggaa ^a^M1.0133^ea^ vu.t.thahitvaa magga.m paccavekkhanti, sekkhaa vaa puthujjanaa vaa kusala.m aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassanti, cetopariya~naa.nena kusalacittasama"ngissa citta.m jaananti. aakaasaana~ncaayatanakusala.m vi~n~naa.na~ncaayatanakusalassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo. aaki~nca~n~naayatanakusala.m nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatanakusalassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo. kusalaa khandhaa iddhividha~naa.nassa cetopariya~naa.nassa pubbenivaasaanussati~naa.nassa yathaakammuupaga~naa.nassa anaagata.msa~naa.nassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] 405^b^.^eb^ kusalo dhammo akusalassa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo -- daana.m datvaa siila.m samaadiyitvaa uposathakamma.m katvaa ta.m assaadeti abhinandati; ta.m aarabbha raago uppajjati, di.t.thi uppajjati, vicikicchaa uppajjati, uddhacca.m uppajjati, domanassa.m uppajjati. pubbe suci.n.naani assaadeti abhinandati; ta.m aarabbha raago uppajjati, di.t.thi uppajjati, vicikicchaa uppajjati, uddhacca.m uppajjati, domanassa.m uppajjati. jhaanaa vu.t.thahitvaa jhaana.m assaadeti abhinandati; ta.m aarabbha ^a^T1.0156^ea^ raago uppajjati, di.t.thi uppajjati, vicikicchaa uppajjati, uddhacca.m uppajjati. jhaane parihiine vippa.tisaarissa domanassa.m uppajjati. (2)

[03] 406^b^.^eb^ kusalo dhammo abyaakatassa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo -- arahaa maggaa vu.t.thahitvaa magga.m paccavekkhati; pubbe suci.n.naani paccavekkhati; kusala.m aniccato dukkhato anattato vippassati; cetopariya~naa.nena kusalacittasama"ngissa citta.m jaanaati. sekkhaa vaa puthujjanaa vaa kusala.m aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassanti, kusale niruddhe vipaako ^a^V1.0155^ea^ tadaaramma.nataa uppajjati. kusala.m assaadeti abhinandati; ta.m aarabbha raago uppajjati, di.t.thi uppajjati, vicikicchaa uppajjati, uddhacca.m uppajjati, domanassa.m uppajjati, akusale niruddhe vipaako tadaaramma.nataa uppajjati. aakaasaana~ncaayatanakusala.m vi~n~naa.na~ncaayatanavipaakassa ca, kiriyassa ca aaramma.napaccayena paccayo. aaki~nca~n~naayatanakusala.m nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatanavipaakassa ca, kiriyassa ca aaramma.napaccayena paccayo. kusalaa khandhaa cetopariya~naa.nassa, pubbenivaasaanussati~naa.nassa, yathaakammuupaga~naa.nassa, anaagata.msa~naa.nassa, aavajjanaaya aaramma.napaccayena paccayo. (3)

[03] 407^b^.^eb^ akusalo ^a^M1.0134^ea^ dhammo akusalassa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo -- raaga.m assaadeti abhinandati; ta.m aarabbha raago uppajjati, di.t.thi uppajjati, vicikicchaa uppajjati, uddhacca.m uppajjati, domanassa.m uppajjati ^a^T1.0157^ea^. di.t.thi.m assaadeti abhinandati; ta.m aarabbha raago uppajjati, di.t.thi uppajjati, vicikicchaa uppajjati, uddhacca.m uppajjati, domanassa.m uppajjati. vicikiccha.m aarabbha vicikicchaa uppajjati, di.t.thi uppajjati, uddhacca.m uppajjati, domanassa.m uppajjati. uddhacca.m aarabbha uddhacca.m uppajjati, di.t.thi uppajjati, vicikicchaa uppajjati, domanassa.m uppajjati. domanassa.m aarabbha domanassa.m uppajjati, di.t.thi uppajjati, vicikicchaa uppajjati, uddhacca.m uppajjati. (1)

[03] 408^b^.^eb^ akusalo dhammo kusalassa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo -- sekkhaa pahiine kilese {pahiinakilese (syaa0)} paccavekkhanti, vikkhambhite kilese {vikkhambhitakilese (syaa0)} paccavekkhanti, pubbe samudaaci.n.ne kilese jaananti, sekkhaa vaa puthujjanaa vaa akusala.m aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassanti, cetopariya~naa.nena akusalacittasama"ngissa citta.m jaananti. akusalaa khandhaa cetopariya~naa.nassa, pubbenivaasaanussati~naa.nassa, yathaakammuupaga~naa.nassa anaagata.msa~naa.nassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo. (2)

[03] 409^b^.^eb^ akusalo dhammo abyaakatassa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo -- arahaa pahiine kilese paccavekkhati, pubbe samudaaci.n.ne kilese jaanaati, akusala.m aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassati, cetopariya~naa.nena akusalacittasama"ngissa citta.m jaanaati, sekkhaa vaa puthujjanaa vaa akusala.m aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassanti ^a^T1.0158^ea^, kusale niruddhe ^a^V1.0156^ea^ vipaako tadaaramma.nataa uppajjati. akusala.m assaadeti abhinandati; ta.m aarabbha raago uppajjati, di.t.thi uppajjati, vicikicchaa uppajjati, uddhacca.m uppajjati, domanassa.m uppajjati. akusale niruddhe vipaako tadaaramma.nataa uppajjati. akusalaa khandhaa cetopariya~naa.nassa pubbenivaasaanussati~naa.nassa yathaakammuupaga~naa.nassa anaagata.msa~naa.nassa aavajjanaaya aaramma.napaccayena paccayo. (3)

[03] 410^b^.^eb^ abyaakato dhammo abyaakatassa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo -- arahaa phala.m paccavekkhati, nibbaana.m paccavekkhati. nibbaana.m phalassa aavajjanaaya ^a^M1.0135^ea^ aaramma.napaccayena paccayo. arahaa cakkhu.m aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassati. sota.m... ghaana.m... jivha.m... kaaya.m... ruupe... sadde... gandhe... rase... pho.t.thabbe... vatthu.m... vipaakaabyaakate kiriyaabyaakate khandhe aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassati, dibbena cakkhunaa ruupa.m passati, dibbaaya sotadhaatuyaa sadda.m su.naati, cetopariya~naa.nena vipaakaabyaakatakiriyaabyaakatacittasama"ngissa citta.m jaanaati. aakaasaana~ncaayatanakiriya.m vi~n~naa.na~ncaayatanakiriyassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo. aaki~nca~n~naayatanakiriya.m nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatanakiriyassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo. ruupaayatana.m cakkhuvi~n~naa.nassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo. saddaayatana.m sotavi~n~naa.nassa... gandhaayatana.m ghaanavi~n~naa.nassa... rasaayatana.m jivhaavi~n~naa.nassa ^a^T1.0159^ea^... pho.t.thabbaayatana.m kaayavi~n~naa.nassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo. abyaakataa khandhaa iddhividha~naa.nassa, cetopariya~naa.nassa, pubbenivaasaanussati~naa.nassa, anaagata.msa~naa.nassa, aavajjanaaya aaramma.napaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] 411^b^.^eb^ abyaakato dhammo kusalassa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo -- sekkhaa phala.m paccavekkhanti, nibbaana.m paccavekkhanti. nibbaana.m gotrabhussa vodaanassa maggassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo. sekkhaa vaa puthujjanaa vaa cakkhu.m aniccato dukkhato anattato vippassanti. sota.m... ghaana.m... jivha.m... kaaya.m... ruupe... sadde... gandhe... rase... pho.t.thabbe... vatthu.m... vipaakaabyaakate kiriyaabyaakate khandhe aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassanti, dibbena cakkhunaa ruupa.m passanti, dibbaaya sotadhaatuyaa sadda.m su.nanti, cetopariya~naa.nena vipaakaabyaakatakiriyaabyaakatacittasama"ngissa citta.m jaananti. abyaakataa khandhaa iddhividha~naa.nassa ^a^V1.0157^ea^ cetopariya~naa.nassa pubbenivaasaanussati~naa.nassa anaagata.msa~naa.nassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo.

[03] 412^b^.^eb^ abyaakato dhammo akusalassa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo -- cakkhu.m assaadeti abhinandati; ta.m aarabbha raago uppajjati, di.t.thi uppajjati, vicikicchaa uppajjati, uddhacca.m uppajjati, domanassa.m uppajjati. sota.m... ghaana.m... jivha.m... kaaya.m... ruupe... sadde... gandhe... rase... pho.t.thabbe... vatthu.m... vipaakaabyaakate kiriyaabyaakate khandhe assaadeti abhinandati ^a^T1.0160^ea^; ta.m aarabbha raago ^a^M1.0136^ea^ uppajjati, di.t.thi uppajjati, vicikicchaa uppajjati, uddhacca.m uppajjati, domanassa.m uppajjati. (3)

[03] 413^b^.^eb^ kusalo dhammo kusalassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo. aaramma.naadhipati, sahajaataadhipati. ^b^aaramma.naadhipati^eb^ -- daana.m datvaa siila.m samaadiyitvaa uposathakamma.m katvaa, ta.m garu.m katvaa paccavekkhati, pubbe suci.n.naani garu.m katvaa paccavekkhati, jhaanaa vu.t.thahitvaa jhaana.m garu.m katvaa paccavekkhati. sekkhaa gotrabhu.m garu.m katvaa paccavekkhanti, vodaana.m garu.m katvaa paccavekkhanti. sekkhaa maggaa vu.t.thahitvaa magga.m garu.m katvaa paccavekkhanti. ^b^sahajaataadhipati^eb^ -- kusalaadhipati sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m adhipatipaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] 414^b^.^eb^ kusalo dhammo akusalassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo. ^b^aaramma.naadhipati^eb^ -- daana.m datvaa siila.m samaadiyitvaa uposathakamma.m katvaa, ta.m garu.m katvaa assaadeti abhinandati; ta.m garu.m katvaa raago uppajjati, di.t.thi uppajjati, pubbe suci.n.naani garu.m katvaa assaadeti abhinandati; ta.m garu.m katvaa raago uppajjati, di.t.thi uppajjati. jhaanaa vu.t.thahitvaa jhaana.m garu.m katvaa assaadeti abhinandati; ta.m garu.m katvaa raago uppajjati, di.t.thi uppajjati.

[03] kusalo dhammo abyaakatassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo. aaramma.naadhipati, sahajaataadhipati ^a^V1.0158^ea^. ^b^aaramma.naadhipati^eb^ -- arahaa maggaa vu.t.thahitvaa magga.m garu.m katvaa paccavekkhati. ^b^sahajaataadhipati^eb^ ^a^T1.0161^ea^ -- kusalaadhipati cittasamu.t.thaanaana.m ruupaana.m adhipatipaccayena paccayo. [03] abyaakato dhammo akusalassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo. ^b^aaramma.naadhipati^eb^ -- cakkhu.m garu.m katvaa assaadeti abhinandati; ta.m garu.m katvaa raago uppajjati, di.t.thi uppajjati. sota.m... ghaana.m... jivha.m... kaaya.m... ruupe... sadde... gandhe... rase... pho.t.thabbe... vatthu.m... vipaakaabyaakate kiriyaabyaakate khandhe garu.m katvaa assaadeti abhinandati; ta.m garu.m katvaa raago uppajjati, di.t.thi uppajjati. [03] 417^b^.^eb^ kusalo dhammo kusalassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo -- purimaa purimaa kusalaa khandhaa pacchimaana.m pacchimaana.m kusalaana.m khandhaana.m anantarapaccayena ^a^M1.0138^ea^ paccayo. anuloma.m gotrabhussa... anuloma.m vodaanassa... gotrabhu maggassa... vodaana.m maggassa anantarapaccayena paccayo. [03] akusalo dhammo akusalassa ca abyaakatassa ca dhammassa nissayapaccayena paccayo -- akusalo eko khandho ti.n.nanna.m khandhaana.m cittasamu.t.thaanaana~nca ruupaana.m nissayapaccayena paccayo. tayo ^a^V1.0165^ea^ khandhaa ekassa khandhassa cittasamu.t.thaanaana~nca ruupaana.m nissayapaccayena paccayo. dve khandhaa dvinna.m khandhaana.m cittasamu.t.thaanaana~nca ruupaana.m nissayapaccayena paccayo. [03] abyaakato dhammo abyaakatassa dhammassa nissayapaccayena paccayo ^a^T1.0171^ea^ -- vipaakaabyaakato kiriyaabyaakato eko khandho ti.n.nanna.m khandhaana.m cittasamu.t.thaanaana~nca ruupaana.m nissayapaccayena paccayo. tayo khandhaa ekassa khandhassa cittasamu.t.thaanaana~nca ruupaana.m nissayapaccayena paccayo. dve khandhaa dvinna.m khandhaana.m cittasamu.t.thaanaana~nca ruupaana.m nissayapaccayena paccayo. pa.tisandhikkha.ne vipaakaabyaakato eko khandho ti.n.nanna.m khandhaana.m ka.tattaa ca ruupaana.m nissayapaccayena paccayo. tayo khandhaa ekassa khandhassa ka.tattaa ca ruupaana.m nissayapaccayena paccayo. dve khandhaa dvinna.m khandhaana.m ka.tattaa ca ruupaana.m nissayapaccayena paccayo. khandhaa vatthussa nissayapaccayena paccayo. vatthu khandhaana.m nissayapaccayena paccayo. eka.m mahaabhuuta.m ti.n.nanna.m mahaabhuutaana.m nissayapaccayena paccayo. tayo mahaabhuutaa ekassa mahaabhuutassa nissayapaccayena paccayo. dve mahaabhuutaa dvinna.m mahaabhuutaana.m nissayapaccayena paccayo. mahaabhuutaa cittasamu.t.thaanaana.m ruupaana.m, ka.tattaaruupaana.m, upaadaaruupaana.m nissayapaccayena paccayo; baahira.m... aahaarasamu.t.thaana.m... utusamu.t.thaana.m... asa~n~nasattaana.m eka.m mahaabhuuta.m ti.n.nanna.m mahaabhuutaana.m nissayapaccayena paccayo. tayo mahaabhuutaa ekassa mahaabhuutassa nissayapaccayena paccayo. dve mahaabhuutaa dvinna.m mahaabhuutaana.m nissayapaccayena paccayo. mahaabhuutaa ka.tattaaruupaana.m, upaadaaruupaana.m nissayapaccayena paccayo. cakkhaayatana.m cakkhuvi~n~naa.nassa nissayapaccayena paccayo. sotaayatana.m...pe0... ghaanaayatana.m...pe0... jivhaayatana.m ^a^T1.0172^ea^ ...pe0... kaayaayatana.m kaayavi~n~naa.nassa nissayapaccayena paccayo. vatthu vipaakaabyaakataana.m kiriyaabyaakataana.m khandhaana.m nissayapaccayena paccayo.
[03] abyaakato ^a^M1.0144^ea^ dhammo kusalassa dhammassa nissayapaccayena paccayo -- vatthu kusalaana.m khandhaana.m nissayapaccayena paccayo. (2)
[03] abyaakato dhammo akusalassa dhammassa nissayapaccayena paccayo -- vatthu akusalaana.m khandhaana.m nissayapaccayena paccayo. (3)

[03] 422^b^.^eb^ kusalo ca abyaakato ca dhammaa kusalassa dhammassa nissayapaccayena paccayo -- kusalo ^a^V1.0166^ea^ eko khandho ca vatthu ca ti.n.nanna.m khandhaana.m nissayapaccayena paccayo. tayo khandhaa ca vatthu ca ekassa khandhassa nissayapaccayena paccayo. dve khandhaa ca vatthu ca dvinna.m khandhaana.m nissayapaccayena paccayo. (1)
[03] kusalo ca abyaakato ca dhammaa abyaakatassa dhammassa nissayapaccayena paccayo -- kusalaa khandhaa ca mahaabhuutaa ca cittasamu.t.thaanaana.m ruupaana.m nissayapaccayena paccayo. (2)

[03] akusalo ca abyaakato ca dhammaa akusalassa dhammassa nissayapaccayena paccayo -- akusalo eko khandho ca vatthu ca ti.n.nanna.m khandhaana.m nissayapaccayena paccayo. tayo khandhaa ca vatthu ca ekassa khandhassa nissayapaccayena paccayo. dve khandhaa ca vatthu ca dvinna.m khandhaana.m nissayapaccayena paccayo. [03] akusalo ^a^T1.0173^ea^ ca abyaakato ca dhammaa abyaakatassa dhammassa nissayapaccayena paccayo -- akusalaa khandhaa ca mahaabhuutaa ca cittasamu.t.thaanaana.m ruupaana.m nissayapaccayena paccayo. (2)
[03] 423^b^.^eb^ kusalo dhammo kusalassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo -- aaramma.nuupanissayo, anantaruupanissayo, pakatuupanissayo.

[03] ^b^aaramma.nuupanissayo^eb^ -- daana.m datvaa siila.m samaadiyitvaa uposathakamma.m katvaa, ta.m garu.m katvaa paccavekkhati, pubbe suci.n.naani garu.m katvaa paccavekkhati, jhaanaa vu.t.thahitvaa jhaana.m garu.m katvaa paccavekkhati, sekkhaa gotrabhu.m garu.m katvaa paccavekkhanti, vodaana.m garu.m katvaa paccavekkhanti, sekkhaa maggaa vu.t.thahitvaa magga.m garu.m katvaa paccavekkhanti.

[03] ^b^anantaruupanissayo^eb^ ^a^M1.0145^ea^ -- purimaa purimaa kusalaa khandhaa pacchimaana.m pacchimaana.m kusalaana.m khandhaana.m upanissayapaccayena paccayo. anuloma.m gotrabhussa... anuloma.m vodaanassa... gotrabhu maggassa... vodaana.m maggassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo.

[03] ^b^pakatuupanissayo^eb^ ^a^V1.0167^ea^ -- saddha.m upanissaaya daana.m deti, siila.m samaadiyati, uposathakamma.m karoti, jhaana.m uppaadeti, vipassana.m uppaadeti, magga.m uppaadeti, abhi~n~na.m uppaadeti, samaapatti.m uppaadeti. siila.m...pe0... suta.m...pe0... caaga.m...pe0... pa~n~na.m upanissaya daana.m deti, siila.m samaadiyati, uposathakamma.m karoti, jhaana.m uppaadeti, vipassana.m uppaadeti, magga.m uppaadeti, abhi~n~na.m uppaadeti, samaapatti.m uppaadeti. saddhaa... siila.m... suta.m... caago... pa~n~naa ^a^T1.0174^ea^... saddhaaya... siilassa... sutassa... caagassa... pa~n~naaya upanissayapaccayena paccayo.

[03] kusalo dhammo akusalassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo -- aaramma.nuupanissayo, pakatuupanissayo.

[03] ^b^aaramma.nuupanissayo^eb^ -- daana.m datvaa siila.m samaadiyitvaa uposathakamma.m katvaa ta.m garu.m katvaa assaadeti abhinandati, ta.m garu.m katvaa raago uppajjati, di.t.thi uppajjati. pubbe suci.n.naani garu.m katvaa assaadeti abhinandati, ta.m garu.m katvaa raago uppajjati, di.t.thi uppajjati. jhaanaa vu.t.thahitvaa jhaana.m garu.m katvaa assaadeti abhinandati, ta.m garu.m katvaa raago uppajjati, di.t.thi uppajjati.

[03] ^b^pakatuupanissayo^eb^ ^a^M1.0147^ea^ -- saddha.m upanissaaya maana.m jappeti, di.t.thi.m ga.nhaati. siila.m...pe0... suta.m...pe0... caaga.m...pe0... pa~n~na.m upanissaaya maana.m jappeti, di.t.thi.m ga.nhaati. saddhaa... siila.m... suta.m... caago... pa~n~naa raagassa... dosassa... mohassa... maanassa... di.t.thiyaa... patthanaaya upanissayapaccayena paccayo. (2)
[03] kusalo ^a^V1.0169^ea^ dhammo abyaakatassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo -- aaramma.nuupanissayo, anantaruupanissayo, pakatuupanissayo.
[03] ^b^aaramma.nuupanissayo^eb^ -- arahaa maggaa vu.t.thahitvaa magga.m garu.m katvaa paccavekkhati.

[03] ^b^anantaruupanissayo^eb^ -- kusala.m vu.t.thaanassa... maggo phalassa... anuloma.m sekkhaaya phalasamaapattiyaa... nirodhaa vu.t.thahantassa nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatanakusala.m phalasamaapattiyaa upanissayapaccayena paccayo.

[03] ^b^pakatuupanissayo^eb^ ^a^T1.0177^ea^ -- saddha.m upanissaaya attaana.m aataapeti paritaapeti, pariyi.t.thimuulaka.m dukkha.m paccanubhoti. siila.m...pe0... suta.m...pe0... caaga.m...pe0... pa~n~na.m upanissaaya attaana.m aataapeti paritaapeti, pariyi.t.thimuulaka.m dukkha.m paccanubhoti. saddhaa... siila.m... suta.m... caago... pa~n~naa kaayikassa sukhassa... kaayikassa dukkhassa... phalasamaapattiyaa upanissayapaccayena paccayo. kusala.m kamma.m vipaakassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo. arahaa magga.m upanissaaya anuppanna.m kiriyasamaapatti.m uppaadeti, uppanna.m samaapajjati, sa"nkhaare aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassati. maggo arahato atthappa.tisambhidaaya, dhammappa.tisambhidaaya, niruttippa.tisambhidaaya, pa.tibhaanappa.tisambhidaaya, .thaanaa.thaanakosallassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo. maggo phalasamaapattiyaa upanissayapaccayena paccayo. (3)
[03] akusalo dhammo akusalassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo -- aaramma.nuupanissayo, anantaruupanissayo, pakatuupanissayo.

[03] ^b^aaramma.nuupanissayo^eb^ -- raaga.m garu.m katvaa assaadeti abhinandati, ta.m garu.m katvaa raago uppajjati, di.t.thi uppajjati. di.t.thi.m garu.m katvaa assaadeti abhinandati, ta.m garu.m katvaa raago uppajjati, di.t.thi uppajjati.

[03] ^b^pakatuupanissayo^eb^ ^a^V1.0170^ea^ -- raaga.m ^a^M1.0148^ea^ upanissaaya paa.na.m hanati, adinna.m aadiyati, musaa bha.nati, pisu.na.m bha.nati, pharusa.m bha.nati, sampha.m palapati, sandhi.m ^a^T1.0178^ea^ chindati, nillopa.m harati, ekaagaarika.m karoti, paripanthe ti.t.thati, paradaara.m gacchati, gaamaghaata.m karoti, nigamaghaata.m karoti, maatara.m jiivitaa voropeti, pitara.m jiivitaa voropeti, arahanta.m jiivitaa voropeti, du.t.thena cittena tathaagatassa lohita.m uppaadeti, sa"ngha.m bhindati. dosa.m upanissaaya...pe0... moha.m upanissaaya...pe0... maana.m upanissaaya...pe0... di.t.thi.m upanissaaya...pe0... patthana.m upanissaaya paa.na.m hanati...pe0... sa"ngha.m bhindati. raago... doso... moho... maano... di.t.thi... patthanaa raagassa... dosassa... mohassa... maanassa... di.t.thiyaa... patthanaaya upanissayapaccayena paccayo. paa.naatipaato paa.naatipaatassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo. paa.naatipaato adinnaadaanassa...pe0... kaamesumicchaacaarassa...pe0... musaavaadassa...pe0... pisu.naaya vaacaaya...pe0... pharusaaya vaacaaya...pe0... samphappalaapassa...pe0... abhijjhaaya...pe0... byaapaadassa...pe0... micchaadi.t.thiyaa upanissayapaccayena paccayo. adinnaadaana.m adinnaadaanassa... kaamesumicchaacaarassa... musaavaadassa... [03] akusalo ^a^V1.0171^ea^ dhammo kusalassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo. ^b^pakatuupanissayo^eb^ -- raaga.m upanissaaya daana.m deti, siila.m samaadiyati, uposathakamma.m karoti, jhaana.m uppaadeti, vipassana.m uppaadeti, magga.m uppaadeti, abhi~n~na.m uppaadeti, samaapatti.m uppaadeti. dosa.m...pe0... moha.m...pe0... maana.m...pe0... di.t.thi.m...pe0... patthana.m upanissaaya daana.m deti, siila.m samaadiyati, uposathakamma.m karoti, jhaana.m uppaadeti, vipassana.m uppaadeti, magga.m uppaadeti, abhi~n~na.m uppaadeti, samaapatti.m uppaadeti. raago... doso... moho... maano... di.t.thi... patthanaa saddhaaya... siilassa... sutassa... caagassa ^a^T1.0180^ea^... pa~n~naaya upanissayapaccayena paccayo. paa.na.m hantvaa tassa pa.tighaatatthaaya daana.m deti, siila.m samaadiyati, uposathakamma.m karoti, jhaana.m uppaadeti, vipassana.m uppaadeti, magga.m uppaadeti, abhi~n~na.m uppaadeti, samaapatti.m uppaadeti. adinna.m aadiyitvaa...pe0... musaa bha.nitvaa...pe0... pisu.na.m bha.nitvaa...pe0... pharusa.m bha.nitvaa...pe0... sampha.m palapitvaa...pe0... sandhi.m chinditvaa...pe0... nillopa.m haritvaa...pe0... ekaagaarika.m karitvaa...pe0... paripanthe .thatvaa...pe0... paradaara.m gantvaa...pe0... gaamaghaata.m karitvaa...pe0... nigamaghaata.m karitvaa tassa pa.tighaatatthaaya daana.m deti, siila.m samaadiyati, uposathakamma.m karoti, jhaana.m uppaadeti, vipassana.m uppaadeti, magga.m uppaadeti, abhi~n~na.m uppaadeti, samaapatti.m uppaadeti. maatara.m jiivitaa voropetvaa tassa pa.tighaatatthaaya daana.m deti, siila.m samaadiyati, uposathakamma.m karoti. pitara.m jiivitaa voropetvaa...pe0... arahanta.m jiivitaa voropetvaa...pe0... du.t.thena cittena tathaagatassa lohita.m uppaadetvaa...pe0... sa"ngha.m bhinditvaa tassa pa.tighaatatthaaya daana.m deti, siila.m samaadiyati, uposathakamma.m karoti. [03] ^b^pakatuupanissayo^eb^ -- raaga.m upanissaaya attaana.m aataapeti paritaapeti, pariyi.t.thimuulaka.m dukkha.m paccanubhoti. dosa.m...pe0... moha.m...pe0... maana.m ^a^M1.0150^ea^...pe0... di.t.thi.m...pe0... patthana.m upanissaaya attaana.m ^a^T1.0181^ea^ aataapeti paritaapeti, pariyi.t.thimuulaka.m dukkha.m paccanubhoti. raago... doso ^a^V1.0172^ea^... moho... maano... di.t.thi... patthanaa kaayikassa sukhassa... kaayikassa dukkhassa... phalasamaapattiyaa upanissayapaccayena paccayo. akusala.m kamma.m vipaakassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo. (3)
[03] abyaakato dhammo abyaakatassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo -- aaramma.nuupanissayo, anantaruupanissayo, pakatuupanissayo.
[03] ^b^aaramma.nuupanissayo^eb^ -- arahaa phala.m garu.m katvaa paccavekkhati, nibbaana.m garu.m katvaa paccavekkhati, nibbaana.m phalassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo.

[03] ^b^anantaruupanissayo^eb^ -- purimaa purimaa vipaakaabyaakataa, kiriyaabyaakataa khandhaa pacchimaana.m pacchimaana.m vipaakaabyaakataana.m kiriyaabyaakataana.m khandhaana.m upanissayapaccayena paccayo. bhava"nga.m aavajjanaaya... kiriya.m vu.t.thaanassa... arahato anuloma.m phalasamaapattiyaa... nirodhaa vu.t.thahantassa nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatanakiriya.m phalasamaapattiyaa upanissayapaccayena paccayo.

[03] ^b^pakatuupanissayo^eb^ -- kaayika.m sukha.m kaayikassa sukhassa, kaayikassa dukkhassa, phalasamaapattiyaa upanissayapaccayena paccayo. kaayika.m dukkha.m kaayikassa sukhassa, kaayikassa dukkhassa, phalasamaapattiyaa upanissayapaccayena paccayo. utu kaayikassa sukhassa, kaayikassa dukkhassa, phalasamaapattiyaa upanissayapaccayena paccayo. bhojana.m kaayikassa sukhassa, kaayikassa dukkhassa, phalasamaapattiyaa upanissayapaccayena paccayo. senaasana.m kaayikassa sukhassa, kaayikassa dukkhassa, phalasamaapattiyaa upanissayapaccayena paccayo. kaayika.m sukha.m... kaayika.m dukkha.m... utu... bhojana.m... senaasana.m kaayikassa sukhassa, kaayikassa ^a^T1.0182^ea^ dukkhassa, phalasamaapattiyaa upanissayapaccayena paccayo. phalasamaapatti kaayikassa sukhassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo.

[03] arahaa kaayika.m sukha.m upanissaaya anuppanna.m kiriyasamaapatti.m uppaadeti, uppanna.m samaapajjati, sa"nkhaare aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassati. kaayika.m ^a^M1.0151^ea^ dukkha.m... utu.m... bhojana.m ^a^V1.0173^ea^... senaasana.m upanissaaya anuppanna.m kiriyasamaapatti.m uppaadeti, uppanna.m samaapajjati, sa"nkhaare aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassati. (1)
[03] abyaakato dhammo kusalassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo -- aaramma.nuupanissayo, anantaruupanissayo, pakatuupanissayo.

[03] ^b^aaramma.nuupanissayo^eb^ -- sekkhaa phala.m garu.m katvaa paccavekkhanti, nibbaana.m garu.m katvaa paccavekkhanti. nibbaana.m gotrabhussa... vodaanassa... maggassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
[03] ^b^anantaruupanissayo^eb^ -- aavajjanaa kusalaana.m khandhaana.m upanissayapaccayena paccayo.

[03] ^b^pakatuupanissayo^eb^ -- kaayika.m sukha.m upanissaaya daana.m deti, siila.m samaadiyati, uposathakamma.m karoti, jhaana.m uppaadeti, vipassana.m uppaadeti, magga.m uppaadeti, abhi~n~na.m uppaadeti, samaapatti.m uppaadeti. kaayika.m dukkha.m... utu.m... bhojana.m... senaasana.m upanissaaya daana.m deti, siila.m samaadiyati, uposathakamma.m karoti, jhaana.m uppaadeti, vipassana.m uppaadeti, magga.m uppaadeti, abhi~n~na.m ^a^T1.0183^ea^ uppaadeti, samaapatti.m uppaadeti. kaayika.m sukha.m... kaayika.m dukkha.m... utu... bhojana.m... senaasana.m saddhaaya... siilassa... sutassa... caagassa... pa~n~naaya upanissayapaccayena paccayo. (2)
[03] abyaakato dhammo akusalassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo -- aaramma.nuupanissayo, anantaruupanissayo, pakatuupanissayo.

[03] ^b^aaramma.nuupanissayo^eb^ -- cakkhu.m garu.m katvaa assaadeti abhinandati, ta.m garu.m katvaa raago uppajjati, di.t.thi uppajjati. sota.m...pe0... ghaana.m...pe0... jivha.m...pe0... kaaya.m...pe0... ruupe...pe0... sadde...pe0... gandhe...pe0... rase...pe0... pho.t.thabbe...pe0... vatthu.m...pe0... vipaakaabyaakate kiriyaabyaakate khandhe garu.m katvaa assaadeti abhinandati, ta.m garu.m katvaa raago uppajjati, di.t.thi uppajjati.
[03] ^b^anantaruupanissayo^eb^ ^a^V1.0174^ea^ -- aavajjanaa akusalaana.m khandhaana.m upanissayapaccayena paccayo.

[03] ^b^pakatuupanissayo^eb^ -- kaayika.m sukha.m upanissaaya paa.na.m hanati, adinna.m aadiyati, musaa bha.nati, pisu.na.m bha.nati, pharusa.m bha.nati, sampha.m palapati, sandhi.m ^a^M1.0152^ea^ chindati, nillopa.m harati, ekaagaarika.m karoti, paripanthe ti.t.thati, paradaara.m gacchati, gaamaghaata.m karoti, nigamaghaata.m karoti, maatara.m jiivitaa voropeti, pitara.m jiivitaa voropeti, arahanta.m jiivitaa voropeti, du.t.thena cittena tathaagatassa lohita.m uppaadeti, sa"ngha.m bhindati.
[03] kaayika.m dukkha.m...pe0... utu.m...pe0... bhojana.m...pe0... senaasana.m upanissaaya paa.na.m hanati... (sa.mkhitta.m.) sa"ngha.m bhindati.
[03] kaayika.m sukha.m... kaayika.m dukkha.m... utu... bhojana.m... senaasana.m raagassa... dosassa... mohassa... maanassa... di.t.thiyaa... patthanaaya upanissayapaccayena paccayo. (3)
[03] 424^b^.^eb^ abyaakato ^a^T1.0184^ea^ dhammo abyaakatassa dhammassa purejaatapaccayena paccayo -- aaramma.napurejaata.m, vatthupurejaata.m.

[03] ^b^aaramma.napurejaata.m^eb^ -- arahaa cakkhu.m aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassati. sota.m...pe0... ghaana.m...pe0... jivha.m...pe0... kaaya.m...pe0... ruupe...pe0... sadde...pe0... gandhe...pe0... rase...pe0... pho.t.thabbe...pe0... vatthu.m aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassati, dibbena cakkhunaa ruupa.m passati, dibbaaya sotadhaatuyaa sadda.m su.naati. ruupaayatana.m cakkhuvi~n~naa.nassa purejaatapaccayena paccayo. saddaayatana.m sotavi~n~naa.nassa...pe0... gandhaayatana.m ghaanavi~n~naa.nassa...pe0... rasaayatana.m jivhaavi~n~naa.nassa...pe0... pho.t.thabbaayatana.m kaayavi~n~naa.nassa purejaatapaccayena paccayo.

(1)
[03] abyaakato dhammo kusalassa dhammassa purejaatapaccayena paccayo -- aaramma.napurejaata.m, vatthupurejaata.m.

[03] ^b^aaramma.napurejaata.m^eb^ ^a^M1.0153^ea^ -- sekkhaa vaa puthujjanaa vaa cakkhu.m aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassanti. sota.m...pe0... ghaana.m...pe0... jivha.m...pe0... kaaya.m...pe0... ruupe...pe0... sadde...pe0... gandhe...pe0... rase...pe0... pho.t.thabbe...pe0... vatthu.m aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassanti. dibbena cakkhunaa ruupa.m passanti. dibbaaya sotadhaatuyaa sadda.m su.nanti.
[03] ^b^vatthupurejaata.m^eb^ ^a^T1.0185^ea^ -- vatthu kusalaana.m khandhaana.m purejaatapaccayena paccayo. (2)

(1)

[03] 434^b^.^eb^ kusalo dhammo abyaakatassa dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo ^a^T1.0194^ea^ -- sahajaata.m, pacchaajaata.m. ^b^sahajaataa^eb^ -- kusalaa khandhaa cittasamu.t.thaanaana.m ruupaana.m vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. ^b^pacchaajaataa^eb^ -- kusalaa khandhaa purejaatassa imassa kaayassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. [03] akusalo dhammo abyaakatassa dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo -- sahajaata.m, pacchaajaata.m. ^b^sahajaataa^eb^ -- akusalaa khandhaa cittasamu.t.thaanaana.m ruupaana.m vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. ^b^pacchaajaataa^eb^ -- akusalaa khandhaa purejaatassa imassa kaayassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. [03] abyaakato dhammo abyaakatassa dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo -- sahajaata.m, purejaata.m, pacchaajaata.m. ^b^sahajaataa^eb^ -- vipaakaabyaakataa kiriyaabyaakataa khandhaa cittasamu.t.thaanaana.m ruupaana.m vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. pa.tisandhikkha.ne vipaakaabyaakataa khandhaa ka.tattaaruupaana.m vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. khandhaa vatthussa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. vatthu khandhaana.m vippayuttapaccayena ^a^V1.0183^ea^ paccayo. ^b^purejaata.m^eb^ -- cakkhaayatana.m cakkhuvi~n~naa.nassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. sotaayatana.m sotavi~n~naa.nassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo ^a^M1.0160^ea^. ghaanaayatana.m ghaanavi~n~naa.nassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. jivhaayatana.m jivhaavi~n~naa.nassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. kaayaayatana.m kaayavi~n~naa.nassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. vatthu vipaakaabyaakataana.m kiriyaabyaakataana.m ^a^T1.0195^ea^ khandhaana.m vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. ^b^pacchaajaataa^eb^ -- vipaakaabyaakataa kiriyaabyaakataa khandhaa purejaatassa imassa kaayassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] abyaakato dhammo akusalassa dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo -- ^b^purejaata.m^eb^ vatthu akusalaana.m khandhaana.m vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. (3)

[03] 435^b^.^eb^ kusalo dhammo kusalassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo -- kusalo eko khandho ti.n.nanna.m khandhaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo. tayo khandhaa ekassa khandhassa atthipaccayena paccayo. dve khandhaa dvinna.m khandhaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] akusalo ^a^M1.0161^ea^ dhammo abyaakatassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo -- sahajaata.m, pacchaajaata.m. ^b^sahajaataa^eb^ -- akusalaa khandhaa cittasamu.t.thaanaana.m ruupaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo. ^b^pacchaajaataa^eb^ -- akusalaa khandhaa purejaatassa imassa kaayassa atthipaccayena paccayo. [03] abyaakato dhammo abyaakatassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo -- sahajaata.m, purejaata.m, pacchaajaata.m, aahaara.m, indriya.m. ^b^sahajaato^eb^ -- vipaakaabyaakato kiriyaabyaakato eko khandho ti.n.nanna.m khandhaana.m ^a^T1.0197^ea^ cittasamu.t.thaanaana~nca ruupaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo. tayo khandhaa ekassa khandhassa cittasamu.t.thaanaana~nca ruupaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo. dve khandhaa dvinna.m khandhaana.m cittasamu.t.thaanaana~nca ruupaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo. pa.tisandhikkha.ne vipaakaabyaakato eko khandho ti.n.nanna.m khandhaana.m ka.tattaa ca ruupaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo. tayo khandhaa ekassa khandhassa ka.tattaa ca ruupaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo. dve khandhaa dvinna.m khandhaana.m ka.tattaa ca ruupaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo. khandhaa vatthussa atthipaccayena paccayo. vatthu khandhaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo. eka.m mahaabhuuta.m ti.n.nanna.m mahaabhuutaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo. tayo mahaabhuutaa ekassa mahaabhuutassa atthipaccayena paccayo. dve mahaabhuutaa dvinna.m mahaabhuutaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo. mahaabhuutaa cittasamu.t.thaanaana.m ruupaana.m ka.tattaaruupaana.m upaadaaruupaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo. baahira.m... aahaarasamu.t.thaana.m... utusamu.t.thaana.m... asa~n~nasattaana.m eka.m mahaabhuuta.m ti.n.nanna.m mahaabhuutaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo. tayo mahaabhuutaa ekassa mahaabhuutassa atthipaccayena paccayo. dve mahaabhuutaa dvinna.m mahaabhuutaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo. mahaabhuutaa ka.tattaaruupaana.m upaadaaruupaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo.

[03] ^b^purejaata.m^eb^ ^a^V1.0185^ea^ ^a^M1.0162^ea^ -- arahaa cakkhu.m aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassati... sota.m...pe0... ghaana.m...pe0... jivha.m...pe0... kaaya.m...pe0... ruupe...pe0... sadde...pe0... gandhe...pe0... rase...pe0... pho.t.thabbe ^a^T1.0198^ea^ ...pe0... vatthu.m aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassati, dibbena cakkhunaa ruupa.m passati; dibbaaya sotadhaatuyaa sadda.m su.naati. ruupaayatana.m cakkhuvi~n~naa.nassa atthipaccayena paccayo. saddaayatana.m...pe0... pho.t.thabbaayatana.m kaayavi~n~naa.nassa atthipaccayena paccayo. cakkhaayatana.m cakkhuvi~n~naa.nassa atthipaccayena paccayo. sotaayatana.m sotavi~n~naa.nassa...pe0... ghaanaayatana.m ghaanavi~n~naa.nassa...pe0... jivhaayatana.m jivhaavi~n~naa.nassa...pe0... kaayaayatana.m kaayavi~n~naa.nassa atthipaccayena paccayo. vatthu vipaakaabyaakataana.m kiriyaabyaakataana.m khandhaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo. ^b^pacchaajaataa^eb^ -- vipaakaabyaakataa kiriyaabyaakataa khandhaa purejaatassa imassa kaayassa atthipaccayena paccayo. ^b^kaba.liikaaro aahaaro^eb^ imassa kaayassa atthipaccayena paccayo. ^b^ruupajiivitindriya.m^eb^ ka.tattaaruupaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] abyaakato dhammo kusalassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo. ^b^purejaata.m^eb^ sekkhaa vaa puthujjanaa vaa cakkhu.m aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassanti... sota.m...pe0... ghaana.m...pe0... jivha.m...pe0... kaaya.m...pe0... ruupe...pe0... sadde...pe0... gandhe...pe0... rase...pe0... pho.t.thabbe...pe0... vatthu.m aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassanti, dibbena cakkhunaa ruupa.m passanti, dibbaaya sotadhaatuyaa sadda.m su.nanti. vatthu kusalaana.m khandhaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo. (2)

[03] abyaakato dhammo akusalassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo ^a^T1.0199^ea^ -- ^b^purejaata.m^eb^ cakkhu.m assaadeti, abhinandati; ta.m aarabbha raago uppajjati, di.t.thi uppajjati, vicikicchaa uppajjati, uddhacca.m uppajjati, domanassa.m uppajjati. sota.m...pe0... ghaana.m...pe0... jivha.m...pe0... kaaya.m...pe0... ruupe...pe0... sadde...pe0... gandhe...pe0... rase...pe0... pho.t.thabbe...pe0... vatthu.m assaadeti, abhinandati; ta.m aarabbha raago uppajjati...pe0... domanassa.m uppajjati. vatthu akusalaana.m khandhaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo. (3)

[03] kusalo ca abyaakato ca dhammaa kusalassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo -- ^b^sahajaata.m, purejaata.m^eb^ ^a^V1.0186^ea^. sahajaato -- kusalo eko khandho ca vatthu ca ti.n.nanna.m khandhaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo...pe0... dve khandhaa ca vatthu ca dvinna.m khandhaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] kusalo ^a^M1.0163^ea^ ca abyaakato ca dhammaa abyaakatassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo -- ^b^sahajaata.m, pacchaajaata.m, aahaara.m, indriya.m^eb^. sahajaataa -- kusalaa khandhaa ca mahaabhuutaa ca cittasamu.t.thaanaana.m ruupaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo. pacchaajaataa -- kusalaa khandhaa ca kaba.liikaaro aahaaro ca imassa kaayassa atthipaccayena paccayo. pacchaajaataa kusalaa khandhaa ca ruupajiivitindriya~nca ka.tattaaruupaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo. [03] akusalo ca abyaakato ca dhammaa akusalassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo -- ^b^sahajaata.m, purejaata.m^eb^. sahajaato -- akusalo eko ^a^T1.0200^ea^ khandho ca vatthu ca ti.n.nanna.m khandhaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo. tayo khandhaa ca vatthu ca ekassa khandhassa atthipaccayena paccayo. dve khandhaa ca vatthu ca dvinna.m khandhaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo. (2)

[03] 436^b^.^eb^ kusalo dhammo kusalassa dhammassa natthipaccayena paccayo -- purimaa purimaa kusalaa khandhaa pacchimaana.m pacchimaana.m kusalaana.m khandhaana.m natthipaccayena paccayo. (sa.mkhitta.m)

[03] 1^b^.^eb^ sukhaaya ^a^T1.0359^ea^ ^a^V1.0331^ea^ ^a^M1.0294^ea^ vedanaaya sampayutta.m dhamma.m pa.ticca sukhaaya vedanaaya sampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayaa -- sukhaaya vedanaaya sampayutta.m eka.m khandha.m pa.ticca dve khandhaa, dve khandhe pa.ticca eko khandho; pa.tisandhikkha.ne sukhaaya vedanaaya sampayutta.m eka.m khandha.m pa.ticca dve khandhaa, dve khandhe pa.ticca eko khandho.

[03] dukkhaaya vedanaaya sampayutta.m dhamma.m pa.ticca dukkhaaya vedanaaya sampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayaa -- dukkhaaya vedanaaya sampayutta.m eka.m khandha.m pa.ticca dve khandhaa, dve khandhe pa.ticca eko khandho.

[03] adukkhamasukhaaya vedanaaya sampayutta.m dhamma.m pa.ticca adukkhamasukhaaya vedanaaya sampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayaa -- adukkhamasukhaaya vedanaaya sampayutta.m eka.m khandha.m pa.ticca dve khandhaa, dve khandhe pa.ticca eko khandho; pa.tisandhikkha.ne adukkhamasukhaaya vedanaaya sampayutta.m eka.m khandha.m pa.ticca dve khandhaa, dve khandhe pa.ticca eko khandho.

[03] 2^b^.^eb^ sukhaaya ^a^V1.0332^ea^ vedanaaya sampayutta.m dhamma.m pa.ticca sukhaaya vedanaaya sampayutto dhammo uppajjati aaramma.napaccayaa... adhipatipaccayaa ^a^T1.0360^ea^ (adhipatiyaa pa.tisandhi natthi)... anantarapaccayaa... samanantarapaccayaa... sahajaatapaccayaa... a~n~nama~n~napaccayaa... nissayapaccayaa... upanissayapaccayaa... purejaatapaccayaa -- sukhaaya vedanaaya sampayutta.m eka.m khandha.m pa.ticca dve khandhaa, dve khandhe pa.ticca eko khandho. vatthu.m purejaatapaccayaa (sa.mkhitta.m).

[03] 39^b^.^eb^ sukhaaya vedanaaya sampayutto dhammo sukhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttassa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo -- sukhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttena cittena daana.m datvaa, siila.m samaadiyitvaa, uposathakamma.m katvaa sukhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttena cittena paccavekkhati. sukhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttaa jhaanaa vu.t.thahitvaa, maggaa vu.t.thahitvaa, phalaa vu.t.thahitvaa sukhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttena cittena paccavekkhati. ariyaa sukhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttena cittena sukhaaya vedanaaya sampayutte pahiine kilese paccavekkhanti, vikkhambhite kilese paccavekkhanti ^a^V1.0347^ea^, pubbe samudaaci.n.ne kilese jaananti. sukhaaya vedanaaya sampayutte khandhe sukhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttena cittena aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassati, assaadeti abhinandati; ta.m aarabbha sukhaaya vedanaaya sampayutto raago uppajjati, di.t.thi uppajjati; sukhaaya ^a^M1.0307^ea^ vedanaaya sampayutte khandhe aarabbha sukhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttaa khandhaa uppajjanti. (1)

[03] sukhaaya vedanaaya sampayutto dhammo dukkhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttassa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo -- sukhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttena cittena daana.m datvaa, siila.m samaadiyitvaa, uposathakamma.m katvaa vippa.tisaarissa domanassa.m uppajjati. sukhaaya vedanaaya sampayutte ^a^T1.0375^ea^ jhaane parihiine vippa.tisaarissa domanassa.m uppajjati. sukhaaya vedanaaya sampayutte khandhe aarabbha dukkhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttaa khandhaa uppajjanti. [03] sukhaaya vedanaaya sampayutto dhammo adukkhamasukhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttassa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo -- sukhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttena cittena daana.m datvaa, siila.m samaadiyitvaa, uposathakamma.m katvaa adukkhamasukhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttena cittena paccavekkhati. sukhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttaa jhaanaa vu.t.thahitvaa, maggaa vu.t.thahitvaa, phalaa vu.t.thahitvaa adukkhamasukhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttena cittena paccavekkhati. ariyaa adukkhamasukhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttena cittena sukhaaya vedanaaya sampayutte pahiine kilese paccavekkhanti, vikkhambhite kilese paccavekkhanti, pubbe samudaaci.n.ne kilese jaananti. sukhaaya vedanaaya sampayutte khandhe adukkhamasukhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttena cittena aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassati, assaadeti abhinandati; ta.m aarabbha adukkhamasukhaaya vedanaaya sampayutto raago uppajjati, di.t.thi uppajjati, vicikicchaa uppajjati, uddhacca.m uppajjati, cetopariya~naa.nena sukhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttacittasama"ngissa citta.m jaanaati. sukhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttaa khandhaa cetopariya~naa.nassa, pubbenivaasaanussati~naa.nassa, yathaakammuupaga~naa.nassa, anaagata.msa~naa.nassa, aavajjanaaya aaramma.napaccayena paccayo ^a^T1.0376^ea^. sukhaaya vedanaaya sampayutte khandhe aarabbha adukkhamasukhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttaa khandhaa uppajjanti. (3)

[03] 40^b^.^eb^ dukkhaaya vedanaaya sampayutto dhammo dukkhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttassa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena ^a^V1.0348^ea^ paccayo -- dosa.m aarabbha doso uppajjati, moho uppajjati; dukkhaaya vedanaaya sampayutta.m moha.m aarabbha moho uppajjati, doso uppajjati; dukkhasahagata.m kaayavi~n~naa.na.m aarabbha ^a^M1.0308^ea^ doso uppajjati, moho uppajjati; dukkhaaya vedanaaya sampayutte khandhe aarabbha dukkhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttaa khandhaa uppajjanti.
