[03] dukkhaaya vedanaaya sampayutto dhammo adukkhamasukhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttassa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo -- ariyaa adukkhamasukhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttena cittena dukkhaaya vedanaaya sampayutte ^a^T1.0377^ea^ pahiine kilese paccavekkhanti, vikkhambhite kilese paccavekkhanti, pubbe samudaaci.n.ne kilese jaananti. dukkhaaya vedanaaya sampayutte khandhe adukkhamasukhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttena cittena aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassati; cetopariya~naa.nena dukkhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttacittasama"ngissa citta.m jaananti. dukkhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttaa khandhaa cetopariya~naa.nassa, pubbenivaasaanussati~naa.nassa, yathaakammuupaga~naa.nassa, anaagata.msa~naa.nassa, aavajjanaaya aaramma.napaccayena paccayo -- dukkhaaya vedanaaya sampayutte khandhe aarabbha adukkhamasukhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttaa khandhaa uppajjanti. (3)

[03] 41^b^.^eb^ adukkhamasukhaaya vedanaaya sampayutto dhammo adukkhamasukhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttassa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo -- adukkhamasukhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttena cittena daana.m datvaa, siila.m samaadiyitvaa, uposathakamma.m katvaa adukkhamasukhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttena cittena paccavekkhati. adukkhamasukhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttaa jhaanaa vu.t.thahitvaa, maggaa vu.t.thahitvaa, phalaa vu.t.thahitvaa adukkhamasukhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttena cittena paccavekkhati; ariyaa adukkhamasukhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttena cittena adukkhamasukhaaya vedanaaya sampayutte pahiine kilese paccavekkhanti, vikkhambhite kilese ^a^V1.0349^ea^ paccavekkhanti, pubbe samudaaci.n.ne kilese jaananti. adukkhamasukhaaya vedanaaya sampayutte khandhe adukkhamasukhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttena ^a^M1.0309^ea^ cittena ^a^T1.0378^ea^ aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassati, assaadeti abhinandati; ta.m aarabbha adukkhamasukhaaya vedanaaya sampayutto raago uppajjati, di.t.thi uppajjati, vicikicchaa uppajjati, uddhacca.m uppajjati; cetopariya~naa.nena adukkhamasukhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttacittasama"ngissa citta.m jaananti. aakaasaana~ncaayatana.m vi~n~naa.na~ncaayatanassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo. aaki~nca~n~naayatana.m nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatanassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo. adukkhamasukhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttaa khandhaa iddhividha~naa.nassa, cetopariya~naa.nassa, pubbenivaasaanussati~naa.nassa, yathaakammuupaga~naa.nassa, anaagata.msa~naa.nassa aavajjanaaya aaramma.napaccayena paccayo. adukkhamasukhaaya vedanaaya sampayutte khandhe aarabbha adukkhamasukhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttaa khandhaa uppajjanti. (1)

[03] adukkhamasukhaaya vedanaaya sampayutto dhammo sukhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttassa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo -- adukkhamasukhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttena cittena daana.m datvaa, siila.m samaadiyitvaa, uposathakamma.m katvaa sukhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttena cittena paccavekkhati. adukkhamasukhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttaa jhaanaa vu.t.thahitvaa, maggaa vu.t.thahitvaa, phalaa vu.t.thahitvaa sukhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttena cittena paccavekkhati. ariyaa sukhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttena cittena adukkhamasukhaaya vedanaaya sampayutte pahiine kilese paccavekkhanti ^a^T1.0379^ea^, vikkhambhite kilese paccavekkhanti, pubbe samudaaci.n.ne kilese jaananti. adukkhamasukhaaya vedanaaya sampayutte khandhe sukhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttena cittena aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassati, assaadeti abhinandati; ta.m aarabbha sukhaaya vedanaaya sampayutto raago uppajjati, di.t.thi uppajjati; adukkhamasukhaaya vedanaaya sampayutte khandhe aarabbha sukhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttaa khandhaa uppajjanti. (2)

[03] adukkhamasukhaaya vedanaaya sampayutto dhammo dukkhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttassa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo -- adukkhamasukhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttena cittena daana.m datvaa, siila.m samaadiyitvaa, uposathakamma.m katvaa vippa.tisaarissa domanassa.m uppajjati, adukkhamasukhaaya vedanaaya ^a^V1.0350^ea^ sampayutte jhaane parihiine vippa.tisaarissa domanassa.m uppajjati, adukkhamasukhaaya vedanaaya sampayutte khandhe aarabbha dukkhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttaa khandhaa uppajjanti. (3)
[03] 42^b^.^eb^ sukhaaya ^a^M1.0310^ea^ vedanaaya sampayutto dhammo sukhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo -- aaramma.naadhipati, sahajaataadhipati.

[03] ^b^aaramma.naadhipati^eb^ -- sukhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttena cittena daana.m datvaa, siila.m samaadiyitvaa, uposathakamma.m katvaa sukhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttena cittena ta.m garu.m katvaa paccavekkhati. sukhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttaa jhaanaa vu.t.thahitvaa, maggaa vu.t.thahitvaa, phalaa vu.t.thahitvaa ^a^T1.0380^ea^ sukhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttena cittena ta.m garu.m katvaa paccavekkhati. sukhaaya vedanaaya sampayutte khandhe sukhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttena cittena garu.m katvaa assaadeti abhinandati; ta.m garu.m katvaa sukhaaya vedanaaya sampayutto raago uppajjati, di.t.thi uppajjati.
[03] ^b^sahajaataadhipati^eb^ -- sukhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttaadhipati sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m adhipatipaccayena paccayo. (1)
[03] sukhaaya vedanaaya sampayutto dhammo adukkhamasukhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo.

[03] ^b^aaramma.naadhipati^eb^ -- sukhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttena cittena daana.m datvaa, siila.m samaadiyitvaa, uposathakamma.m katvaa adukkhamasukhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttena cittena ta.m garu.m katvaa paccavekkhati. sukhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttaa jhaanaa vu.t.thahitvaa, maggaa vu.t.thahitvaa, phalaa vu.t.thahitvaa adukkhamasukhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttena cittena ta.m garu.m katvaa paccavekkhati. sukhaaya vedanaaya sampayutte khandhe adukkhamasukhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttena cittena garu.m katvaa assaadeti abhinandati; ta.m garu.m katvaa adukkhamasukhaaya vedanaaya sampayutto raago uppajjati, di.t.thi uppajjati. (2)
[03] 43^b^.^eb^ dukkhaaya ^a^V1.0351^ea^ vedanaaya sampayutto dhammo dukkhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo.

[03] 44^b^.^eb^ adukkhamasukhaaya ^a^M1.0311^ea^ vedanaaya sampayutto dhammo adukkhamasukhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo -- aaramma.naadhipati, sahajaataadhipati.

[03] ^b^aaramma.naadhipati^eb^ -- adukkhamasukhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttena cittena daana.m datvaa, siila.m samaadiyitvaa, uposathakamma.m katvaa adukkhamasukhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttena cittena ta.m garu.m katvaa paccavekkhati. adukkhamasukhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttaa jhaanaa vu.t.thahitvaa, maggaa vu.t.thahitvaa, phalaa vu.t.thahitvaa adukkhamasukhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttena cittena ta.m garu.m katvaa paccavekkhati. adukkhamasukhaaya vedanaaya sampayutte khandhe adukkhamasukhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttena cittena garu.m katvaa assaadeti abhinandati; ta.m garu.m katvaa adukkhamasukhaaya vedanaaya sampayutto raago uppajjati, di.t.thi uppajjati.

[03] adukkhamasukhaaya vedanaaya sampayutto dhammo sukhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo.

[03] ^b^aaramma.naadhipati^eb^ -- adukkhamasukhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttena cittena daana.m datvaa, siila.m samaadiyitvaa, uposathakamma.m katvaa sukhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttena cittena ta.m garu.m katvaa paccavekkhati. adukkhamasukhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttaa jhaanaa vu.t.thahitvaa, maggaa vu.t.thahitvaa, phalaa vu.t.thahitvaa ^a^T1.0382^ea^ sukhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttena cittena ta.m garu.m katvaa paccavekkhati. adukkhamasukhaaya vedanaaya sampayutte khandhe sukhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttena cittena garu.m katvaa assaadeti ^a^V1.0352^ea^ abhinandati; ta.m garu.m katvaa sukhaaya vedanaaya sampayutto raago uppajjati, di.t.thi uppajjati. (2)

[03] 45^b^.^eb^ sukhaaya vedanaaya sampayutto dhammo sukhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo -- purimaa purimaa sukhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttaa khandhaa pacchimaana.m pacchimaana.m sukhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m anantarapaccayena paccayo. sukhaaya vedanaaya sampayutta.m ^a^M1.0312^ea^ anuloma.m sukhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttassa gotrabhussa anantarapaccayena paccayo, anuloma.m vodaanassa... gotrabhu maggassa... vodaana.m maggassa... maggo phalassa... phala.m phalassa... anuloma.m sukhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttaaya phalasamaapattiyaa anantarapaccayena paccayo. sukhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttaa khandhaa sukhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttassa vu.t.thaanassa anantarapaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] sukhaaya vedanaaya sampayutto dhammo adukkhamasukhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo -- sukhaaya vedanaaya sampayutta.m cuticitta.m adukkhamasukhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttassa upapatticittassa anantarapaccayena paccayo. sukhaaya vedanaaya sampayutta.m bhava"nga.m aavajjanaaya anantarapaccayena paccayo. sukhasahagata.m kaayavi~n~naa.na.m ^a^T1.0383^ea^ vipaakamanodhaatuyaa anantarapaccayena paccayo. sukhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttaa vipaakamanovi~n~naa.nadhaatu kiriyamanovi~n~naa.nadhaatuyaa anantarapaccayena paccayo. sukhaaya vedanaaya sampayutta.m bhava"nga.m adukkhamasukhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttassa bhava"ngassa anantarapaccayena paccayo. sukhaaya vedanaaya sampayutta.m kusalaakusala.m adukkhamasukhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttassa vu.t.thaanassa... kiriya.m vu.t.thaanassa... phala.m vu.t.thaanassa anantarapaccayena paccayo. (2)

[03] 46^b^.^eb^ dukkhaaya vedanaaya sampayutto dhammo dukkhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo -- purimaa purimaa dukkhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttaa khandhaa pacchimaana.m pacchimaana.m dukkhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m anantarapaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] dukkhaaya ^a^V1.0353^ea^ vedanaaya sampayutto dhammo adukkhamasukhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo -- dukkhasahagata.m kaayavi~n~naa.na.m vipaakamanodhaatuyaa anantarapaccayena paccayo. dukkhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttaa khandhaa adukkhamasukhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttassa vu.t.thaanassa anantarapaccayena paccayo. (2)

[03] 47^b^.^eb^ adukkhamasukhaaya vedanaaya sampayutto dhammo adukkhamasukhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo -- purimaa purimaa adukkhamasukhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttaa khandhaa pacchimaana.m pacchimaana.m adukkhamasukhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m anantarapaccayena ^a^T1.0384^ea^ paccayo ^a^M1.0313^ea^. adukkhamasukhaaya vedanaaya sampayutta.m anuloma.m adukkhamasukhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttassa gotrabhussa anantarapaccayena paccayo. anuloma.m vodaanassa... gotrabhu maggassa... vodaana.m maggassa... maggo phalassa... phala.m phalassa... anuloma.m phalasamaapattiyaa... nirodhaa vu.t.thahantassa nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatana.m adukkhamasukhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttaaya phalasamaapattiyaa anantarapaccayena paccayo. adukkhamasukhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttaa khandhaa adukkhamasukhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttassa vu.t.thaanassa anantarapaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] adukkhamasukhaaya vedanaaya sampayutto dhammo sukhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo -- adukkhamasukhaaya vedanaaya sampayutta.m cuticitta.m sukhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttassa upapatticittassa anantarapaccayena paccayo. aavajjanaa sukhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m anantarapaccayena paccayo. vipaakamanodhaatu sukhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttaaya vipaakamanovi~n~naa.nadhaatuyaa anantarapaccayena paccayo. adukkhamasukhaaya vedanaaya sampayutta.m bhava"nga.m sukhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttassa bhava"ngassa anantarapaccayena paccayo. adukkhamasukhaaya vedanaaya sampayutta.m kusalaakusala.m sukhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttassa vu.t.thaanassa... kiriya.m vu.t.thaanassa... phala.m vu.t.thaanassa... nirodhaa vu.t.thahantassa nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatana.m sukhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttaaya phalasamaapattiyaa anantarapaccayena paccayo. (2)

[03] adukkhamasukhaaya ^a^T1.0385^ea^ vedanaaya sampayutto dhammo dukkhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo -- aavajjanaa dukkhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m anantarapaccayena paccayo. (3)
[03] 48^b^.^eb^ sukhaaya ^a^V1.0354^ea^ vedanaaya sampayutto dhammo sukhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttassa dhammassa samanantarapaccayena paccayo (anantarapaccayasadisa.m).

[03] 49^b^.^eb^ sukhaaya vedanaaya sampayutto dhammo sukhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttassa dhammassa sahajaatapaccayena paccayo -- sukhaaya vedanaaya sampayutto ^a^M1.0314^ea^ eko khandho dvinna.m khandhaana.m sahajaatapaccayena paccayo. dve khandhaa ekassa khandhassa sahajaatapaccayena paccayo. pa.tisandhikkha.ne sukhaaya vedanaaya sampayutto eko khandho dvinna.m khandhaana.m sahajaatapaccayena paccayo. dve khandhaa ekassa khandhassa sahajaatapaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] 50^b^.^eb^ dukkhaaya vedanaaya sampayutto dhammo dukkhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttassa dhammassa sahajaatapaccayena paccayo -- dukkhaaya vedanaaya sampayutto eko khandho dvinna.m khandhaana.m sahajaatapaccayena paccayo. dve khandhaa ekassa khandhassa sahajaatapaccayena paccayo. (dukkhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttapa.tisandhi na labbhati.) (1)

[03] 51^b^.^eb^ adukkhamasukhaaya vedanaaya sampayutto dhammo adukkhamasukhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttassa dhammassa sahajaatapaccayena paccayo -- adukkhamasukhaaya ^a^T1.0386^ea^ vedanaaya sampayutto eko khandho dvinna.m khandhaana.m sahajaatapaccayena paccayo. dve khandhaa ekassa khandhassa sahajaatapaccayena paccayo. pa.tisandhikkha.ne adukkhamasukhaaya vedanaaya sampayutto eko khandho dvinna.m khandhaana.m sahajaatapaccayena paccayo. dve khandhaa ekassa khandhassa sahajaatapaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] 52^b^.^eb^ sukhaaya vedanaaya sampayutto dhammo sukhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttassa dhammassa a~n~nama~n~napaccayena paccayo... nissayapaccayena paccayo (a~n~nama~n~nampi nissayampi sahajaatapaccayasadisa.m).

[03] 53^b^.^eb^ sukhaaya ^a^V1.0355^ea^ vedanaaya sampayutto dhammo sukhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo -- ^b^aaramma.nuupanissayo, anantaruupanissayo, pakatuupanissayo...pe0....^eb^

[03] pakatuupanissayo -- sukhaaya vedanaaya sampayutta.m saddha.m upanissaaya sukhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttena cittena daana.m deti, siila.m samaadiyati, uposathakamma.m karoti, sukhaaya vedanaaya sampayutta.m jhaana.m uppaadeti, vipassana.m ^a^M1.0315^ea^ uppaadeti, magga.m uppaadeti, samaapatti.m uppaadeti, maana.m jappeti, di.t.thi.m ga.nhaati. sukhaaya vedanaaya sampayutta.m siila.m... suta.m... caaga.m... pa~n~na.m... raaga.m... moha.m... maana.m... di.t.thi.m... patthana.m... sukhasahagata.m kaayavi~n~naa.na.m upanissaaya sukhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttena cittena daana.m deti...pe0... samaapatti.m uppaadeti (saddhaapa~ncamakesu ``maana.m jappeti, di.t.thi.m ga.nhaatii''ti kaatabba.m, avasesesu ^a^T1.0387^ea^ na kaatabba.m). sukhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttena cittena adinna.m aadiyati, musaa bha.nati, pisu.na.m bha.nati, sampha.m palapati, sandhi.m chindati, nillopa.m harati, ekaagaarika.m karoti, paripanthe ti.t.thati, paradaara.m gacchati, gaamaghaata.m karoti, nigamaghaata.m karoti. sukhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttaa saddhaa... siila.m... suta.m... caago... pa~n~naa... raago... moho... maano... di.t.thi... patthanaa... sukhasahagata.m kaayavi~n~naa.na.m sukhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttaaya saddhaaya... siilassa... sutassa... caagassa... pa~n~naaya... raagassa... mohassa... maanassa... di.t.thiyaa... patthanaaya... sukhasahagatassa kaayavi~n~naa.nassa... sukhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m upanissayapaccayena paccayo. (1)
[03] sukhaaya vedanaaya sampayutto dhammo dukkhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo.

[03] ^b^pakatuupanissayo^eb^ -- sukhaaya vedanaaya sampayutta.m saddha.m upanissaaya attaana.m aataapeti paritaapeti, pariyi.t.thimuulaka.m dukkha.m paccanubhoti. sukhaaya vedanaaya sampayutta.m siila.m... suta.m... caaga.m... pa~n~na.m upanissaaya attaana.m aataapeti paritaapeti, pariyi.t.thimuulaka.m dukkha.m paccanubhoti. sukhaaya vedanaaya sampayutta.m raaga.m... moha.m... maana.m... di.t.thi.m... patthana.m... sukhasahagata.m kaayavi~n~naa.na.m upanissaaya paa.na.m hanati. dukkhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttena cittena adinna.m aadiyati, musaa bha.nati ^a^V1.0356^ea^, pisu.na.m bha.nati, pharusa.m bha.nati, sampha.m palapati, sandhi.m chindati, nillopa.m harati, ekaagaarika.m karoti, paripanthe ^a^T1.0388^ea^ ti.t.thati, paradaara.m gacchati, gaamaghaata.m karoti, nigamaghaata.m karoti, maatara.m jiivitaa voropeti, pitara.m jiivitaa voropeti, arahanta.m jiivitaa voropeti, du.t.thena cittena tathaagatassa lohita.m uppaadeti, sa"ngha.m bhindati. sukhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttaa saddhaa... siila.m... suta.m... caago... pa~n~naa... raago... moho... maano... di.t.thi... patthanaa... sukhasahagata.m kaayavi~n~naa.na.m dosassa... mohassa... dukkhasahagatassa kaayavi~n~naa.nassa... dukkhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m upanissayapaccayena paccayo. (2)

[03] sukhaaya ^a^M1.0316^ea^ vedanaaya sampayutto dhammo adukkhamasukhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo -- ^b^aaramma.nuupanissayo, anantaruupanissayo, pakatuupanissayo...pe0....^eb^

[03] pakatuupanissayo -- sukhaaya vedanaaya sampayutta.m saddha.m upanissaaya adukkhamasukhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttena cittena daana.m deti, siila.m samaadiyati, uposathakamma.m karoti, adukkhamasukhaaya vedanaaya sampayutta.m jhaana.m uppaadeti, vipassana.m uppaadeti, magga.m uppaadeti, abhi~n~na.m uppaadeti, samaapatti.m uppaadeti, maana.m jappeti, di.t.thi.m ga.nhaati. sukhaaya vedanaaya sampayutta.m siila.m... suta.m... caaga.m... pa~n~na.m... raaga.m... moha.m... maana.m... di.t.thi.m... patthana.m... sukhasahagata.m kaayavi~n~naa.na.m upanissaaya adukkhamasukhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttena cittena daana.m deti...pe0... samaapatti.m uppaadeti. adukkhamasukhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttena cittena adinna.m aadiyati ^a^T1.0389^ea^, musaa bha.nati, pisu.na.m bha.nati, sampha.m palapati {pharusa.m bha.nati, sampha.m palapati (sii0 syaa0)}, sandhi.m chindati, nillopa.m harati, ekaagaarika.m karoti, paripanthe ti.t.thati, paradaara.m gacchati, gaamaghaata.m karoti, nigamaghaata.m karoti. sukhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttaa saddhaa... siila.m... suta.m... caago... pa~n~naa... raago... moho... maano... di.t.thi... patthanaa... sukhasahagata.m kaayavi~n~naa.na.m adukkhamasukhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttaaya saddhaaya... siilassa... sutassa... caagassa... pa~n~naaya... raagassa... mohassa... maanassa... di.t.thiyaa... patthanaaya... adukkhamasukhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m upanissayapaccayena paccayo. [03] (yathaa kusalattike paccaniiyaga.nanaa, eva.m ga.netabba.m.)
[06] paccaniiya.m.
[03] 87^b^.^eb^ hetupaccayaa ^a^T1.0445^ea^ naadhipatiyaa tii.ni...pe0... navippayutte tii.ni.
[03] (yathaa kusalattike anulomapaccaniiyaga.nanaa, eva.m ga.netabba.m.)
[06] anulomapaccaniiya.m.
[03] 88^b^.^eb^ nahetupaccayaa aaramma.ne tii.ni...pe0... magge eka.m...pe0... avigate tii.ni.

[06] paccaniiyaanuloma.m.
[06] sa.msa.t.thavaaro.
[03] 89^b^.^eb^ vipaaka.m ^a^V1.0413^ea^ dhamma.m sampayutto vipaako dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayaa -- vipaaka.m eka.m khandha.m sampayuttaa tayo khandhaa...pe0....
[01] hetuyaa ^a^M1.0363^ea^ tii.ni...pe0....
[01] nahetuyaa tii.ni...pe0....

[03] nahetupaccayaa aaramma.ne tii.ni...pe0....

[03] 90^b^.^eb^ vipaako dhammo vipaakassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo -- vipaakaa hetuu sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m hetupaccayena paccayo; pa.tisandhikkha.ne vipaakaa hetuu sappayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m hetupaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] vipaako dhammo nevavipaakanavipaakadhammadhammassa hetupaccayena ^a^T1.0446^ea^ paccayo -- vipaakaa hetuu cittasamu.t.thaanaana.m ^a^V1.0414^ea^ ruupaana.m hetupaccayena paccayo; pa.tisandhikkha.ne vipaakaa hetuu ka.tattaaruupaana.m hetupaccayena paccayo. (2)

[03] vipaako dhammo vipaakassa ca nevavipaakanavipaakadhammadhammassa ca hetupaccayena paccayo -- vipaakaa hetuu sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m cittasamu.t.thaanaana~nca ruupaana.m hetupaccayena paccayo; pa.tisandhikkha.ne vipaakaa hetuu sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m ka.tattaa ca ruupaana.m hetupaccayena paccayo. (3)
[03] 91^b^.^eb^ vipaakadhammadhammo vipaakadhammadhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo -- vipaakadhammadhammaa hetuu sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m hetupaccayena paccayo. (1)
[03] vipaakadhammadhammo nevavipaakanavipaakadhammadhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo -- vipaakadhammadhammaa hetuu cittasamu.t.thaanaana.m ruupaana.m hetupaccayena paccayo. (2)

[03] vipaakadhammadhammo ^a^M1.0364^ea^ vipaakadhammadhammassa ca nevavipaakanavipaakadhammadhammassa ca hetupaccayena paccayo -- vipaakadhammadhammaa hetuu sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m cittasamu.t.thaanaana~nca ruupaana.m hetupaccayena paccayo. (3)

[03] nevavipaakanavipaakadhammadhammo nevavipaakanavipaakadhammadhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo -- nevavipaakanavipaakadhammadhammaa hetuu sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m cittasamu.t.thaanaana~nca ruupaana.m hetupaccayena paccayo.

[03] 92^b^.^eb^ vipaako dhammo vipaakassa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo ^a^T1.0447^ea^ -- vipaake khandhe aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassati, assaadeti abhinandati; ta.m aarabbha raago uppajjati, di.t.thi uppajjati, vicikicchaa uppajjati, uddhacca.m uppajjati, domanassa.m uppajjati, kusalaakusale niruddhe vipaako tadaaramma.nataa uppajjati. (1)

[03] vipaako ^a^V1.0415^ea^ dhammo vipaakadhammadhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo -- sekkhaa phala.m paccavekkhanti, vipaake khandhe aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassanti, assaadenti abhinandanti; ta.m aarabbha raago uppajjati...pe0... domanassa.m uppajjati, cetopariya~naa.nena vipaakacittasama"ngissa citta.m jaananti. vipaakaa khandhaa cetopariya~naa.nassa, pubbenivaasaanussati~naa.nassa, anaagata.msa~naa.nassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo. (2)

[03] vipaako dhammo nevavipaakanavipaakadhammadhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo -- arahaa phala.m paccavekkhati, vipaake khandhe aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassati, cetopariya~naa.nena vipaakacittasama"ngissa citta.m jaanaati. vipaakaa khandhaa cetopariya~naa.nassa, pubbenivaasaanussati~naa.nassa, anaagata.msa~naa.nassa, aavajjanaaya aaramma.napaccayena paccayo. (3)

[03] 93^b^.^eb^ vipaakadhammadhammo vipaakadhammadhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo -- daana.m datvaa siila.m samaadiyitvaa uposathakamma.m katvaa ta.m paccavekkhati, pubbe suci.n.naani paccavekkhati, jhaanaa vu.t.thahitvaa jhaana.m paccavekkhati, sekkhaa gotrabhu.m paccavekkhanti, vodaana.m paccavekkhanti ^a^T1.0448^ea^, sekkhaa maggaa vu.t.thahitvaa magga.m paccavekkhanti, sekkhaa pahiine kilese paccavekkhanti, vikkhambhite kilese paccavekkhanti ^a^M1.0365^ea^, pubbe samudaaci.n.ne kilese jaananti, vipaakadhammadhamme khandhe aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassanti, assaadenti abhinandanti; ta.m aarabbha raago uppajjati...pe0... domanassa.m uppajjati, cetopariya~naa.nena vipaakadhammadhammacittasama"ngissa citta.m jaananti. aakaasaana~ncaayatanakusala.m vi~n~naa.na~ncaayatanakusalassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo. aaki~nca~n~naayatanakusala.m nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatanakusalassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo. vipaakadhammadhammaa khandhaa iddhividha~naa.nassa, cetopariya~naa.nassa, pubbenivaasaanussati~naa.nassa, yathaakammuupaga~naa.nassa, anaagata.msa~naa.nassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] vipaakadhammadhammo vipaakassa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo -- vipaakadhammadhamme khandhe aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassanti, assaadenti abhinandanti; ta.m aarabbha raago uppajjati...pe0... domanassa.m uppajjati, kusalaakusale niruddhe vipaako tadaaramma.nataa uppajjati. aakaasaana~ncaayatanakusala.m vi~n~naa.na~ncaayatanavipaakassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo ^a^V1.0416^ea^. aaki~nca~n~naayatanakusala.m nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatanavipaakassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo. (2)

[03] vipaakadhammadhammo nevavipaakanavipaakadhammadhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo -- arahaa maggaa vu.t.thahitvaa magga.m paccavekkhati, pubbe suci.n.naani paccavekkhati. arahaa pahiine ^a^T1.0449^ea^ kilese paccavekkhati, pubbe samudaaci.n.ne kilese jaanaati, vipaakadhammadhamme khandhe aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassati, cetopariya~naa.nena vipaakadhammadhammacittasama"ngissa citta.m jaanaati. aakaasaana~ncaayatanakusala.m vi~n~naa.na~ncaayatanakiriyassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo. aaki~nca~n~naayatanakusala.m nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatanakiriyassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo. vipaakadhammadhammaa khandhaa cetopariya~naa.nassa, pubbenivaasaanussati~naa.nassa, yathaakammuupaga~naa.nassa, anaagata.msa~naa.nassa, aavajjanaaya aaramma.napaccayena paccayo. (3)

[03] 94^b^.^eb^ nevavipaakanavipaakadhammadhammo nevavipaakanavipaakadhammadhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo -- arahaa nibbaana.m paccavekkhati. nibbaana.m aavajjanaaya aaramma.napaccayena paccayo. arahaa cakkhu.m aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassati. sota.m... ghaana.m... jivha.m... kaaya.m... ruupe... sadde... gandhe... rase ^a^M1.0366^ea^... pho.t.thabbe... vatthu.m... nevavipaakanavipaakadhammadhamme khandhe aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassati, dibbena cakkhunaa ruupa.m passati, dibbaaya sotadhaatuyaa sadda.m su.naati, cetopariya~naa.nena nevavipaakanavipaakadhammadhammacittasama"ngissa citta.m jaanaati. aakaasaana~ncaayatanakiriya.m vi~n~naa.na~ncaayatanakiriyassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo. aaki~nca~n~naayatanakiriya.m nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatanakiriyassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo. nevavipaakanavipaakadhammadhammaa khandhaa iddhividha~naa.nassa, cetopariya~naa.nassa, pubbenivaasaanussati~naa.nassa ^a^T1.0450^ea^, anaagata.msa~naa.nassa, aavajjanaaya aaramma.napaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] nevavipaakanavipaakadhammadhammo vipaakassa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo -- nibbaana.m phalassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo. sekkhaa vaa puthujjanaa vaa cakkhu.m aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassanti, assaadenti abhinandanti; ta.m aarabbha raago uppajjati...pe0... domanassa.m uppajjati. kusalaakusale niruddhe vipaako tadaaramma.nataa uppajjati. sota.m... ghaana.m... jivha.m... kaaya.m... ruupe... sadde... gandhe... rase... pho.t.thabbe... vatthu.m... nevavipaakanavipaakadhammadhamme ^a^V1.0417^ea^ khandhe aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassanti, assaadenti abhinandanti; ta.m aarabbha raago uppajjati...pe0... domanassa.m uppajjati. kusalaakusale niruddhe vipaako tadaaramma.nataa uppajjati. ruupaayatana.m cakkhuvi~n~naa.nassa...pe0... pho.t.thabbaayatana.m kaayavi~n~naa.nassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo. (2)

[03] nevavipaakanavipaakadhammadhammo vipaakadhammadhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo -- sekkhaa nibbaana.m paccavekkhanti; nibbaana.m gotrabhussa, vodaanassa, maggassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo. sekkhaa vaa puthujjanaa vaa cakkhu.m aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassanti, assaadenti abhinandati; ta.m aarabbha raago uppajjati...pe0... domanassa.m uppajjati. sota.m...pe0... nevavipaakanavipaakadhammadhamme khandhe aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassanti, assaadenti abhinandanti...pe0... dibbena cakkhunaa ruupa.m passanti, dibbaaya sotadhaatuyaa sadda.m ^a^T1.0451^ea^ su.nanti, cetopariya~naa.nena nevavipaakanavipaakadhammadhammacittasama"ngissa citta.m jaananti. nevavipaakanavipaakadhammadhammaa khandhaa iddhividha~naa.nassa, cetopariya~naa.nassa, pubbenivaasaanussati~naa.nassa, anaagata.msa~naa.nassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo. (3)
[03] 95^b^.^eb^ vipaako ^a^M1.0367^ea^ dhammo vipaakassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo. ^b^sahajaataadhipati^eb^ -- vipaakaadhipati sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m adhipatipaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] 96^b^.^eb^ vipaakadhammadhammo vipaakadhammadhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo -- aaramma.naadhipati, sahajaataadhipati. ^b^aaramma.naadhipati^eb^ -- daana.m datvaa siila.m samaadiyitvaa uposathakamma.m katvaa ta.m garu.m katvaa paccavekkhati ^a^T1.0452^ea^, pubbe suci.n.naani garu.m katvaa paccavekkhati, jhaanaa vu.t.thahitvaa jhaana.m garu.m katvaa paccavekkhati, sekkhaa gotrabhu.m garu.m katvaa paccavekkhanti, vodaana.m garu.m katvaa paccavekkhanti, sekkhaa maggaa vu.t.thahitvaa magga.m garu.m katvaa paccavekkhanti, vipaakadhammadhamme khandhe garu.m katvaa assaadenti abhinandanti; ta.m garu.m katvaa raago uppajjati, di.t.thi uppajjati,. ^b^sahajaataadhipati^eb^ -- vipaakadhammadhammaadhipati sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m adhipatipaccayena paccayo. [03] 97^b^.^eb^ vipaako dhammo vipaakassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo -- purimaa purimaa vipaakaa khandhaa pacchimaana.m pacchimaana.m vipaakaana.m khandhaana.m anantarapaccayena paccayo. pa~ncavi~n~naa.na.m vipaakamanodhaatuyaa anantarapaccayena paccayo. vipaakamanodhaatu vipaakamanovi~n~naa.nadhaatuyaa anantarapaccayena paccayo. [03] 115^b^.^eb^ vipaako dhammo nevavipaakanavipaakadhammadhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo -- sahajaata.m, pacchaajaata.m. ^b^sahajaataa^eb^ -- vipaakaa khandhaa cittasamu.t.thaanaana.m ruupaana.m vippayuttapaccayena paccayo; pa.tisandhikkha.ne vipaakaa ^a^M1.0379^ea^ khandhaa ka.tattaaruupaana.m ^a^T1.0467^ea^ vippayuttapaccayena paccayo; khandhaa vatthussa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. ^b^pacchaajaataa^eb^ -- vipaakaa khandhaa purejaatassa imassa kaayassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] vipaakadhammadhammo nevavipaakanavipaakadhammadhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo -- sahajaata.m, pacchaajaata.m. ^b^sahajaataa^eb^ -- vipaakadhammadhammaa khandhaa cittasamu.t.thaanaana.m ruupaana.m vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. ^b^pacchaajaataa^eb^ -- vipaakadhammadhammaa khandhaa purejaatassa imassa kaayassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. [03] 120^b^.^eb^ hetuyaa satta, aaramma.ne nava, adhipatiyaa dasa, anantare satta, samanantare satta, sahajaate ekaadasa, a~n~nama~n~ne satta, nissaye terasa, upanissaye nava, purejaate tii.ni, pacchaajaate tii.ni, aasevane dve, kamme nava, vipaake tii.ni, aahaare satta, indriye nava, jhaane satta, magge satta, sampayutte tii.ni, vippayutte pa~nca, atthiyaa terasa, natthiyaa satta, vigate satta, avigate terasa.

[03] 52^b^.^eb^ upaadinnupaadaaniyo ^a^M1.0408^ea^ dhammo upaadinnupaadaaniyassa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo -- sekkhaa vaa puthujjanaa vaa cakkhu.m aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassanti, assaadenti abhinandanti; ta.m aarabbha raago uppajjati...pe0... domanassa.m uppajjati; kusalaakusale niruddhe vipaako tadaaramma.nataa uppajjati. sota.m... ghaana.m... jivha.m... kaaya.m... upaadinnupaadaaniye ruupe... gandhe... rase... pho.t.thabbe... vatthu.m... upaadinnupaadaaniye khandhe aniccato dukkhato anattato vippassanti, assaadenti abhinandati; ta.m aarabbha raago uppajjati...pe0... domanassa.m uppajjati. kusalaakusale niruddhe vipaako tadaaramma.nataa uppajjati. upaadinnupaadaaniya.m ruupaayatana.m cakkhuvi~n~naa.nassa...pe0... upaadinnupaadaaniya.m gandhaayatana.m... rasaayatana.m... pho.t.thabbaayatana.m kaayavi~n~naa.nassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo. [03] 53^b^.^eb^ anupaadinnupaadaaniyo dhammo anupaadinnupaadaaniyassa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo -- daana.m datvaa, siila.m samaadiyitvaa, uposathakamma.m katvaa ta.m paccavekkhati, pubbe suci.n.naani ^a^V1.0468^ea^ paccavekkhati, jhaanaa vu.t.thahitvaa jhaana.m paccavekkhati, ariyaa gotrabhu.m paccavekkhanti, vodaana.m paccavekkhanti, ariyaa pahiine kilese paccavekkhanti, vikkhambhite kilese paccavekkhanti, pubbe samudaaci.n.ne kilese jaananti; anupaadinnupaadaaniye ruupe... sadde... gandhe... rase... pho.t.thabbe... anupaadinnupaadaaniye khandhe aniccato dukkhato anattato ^a^M1.0409^ea^ vipassanti, assaadenti abhinandanti; ta.m aarabbha raago uppajjati...pe0... domanassa.m uppajjati. dibbena cakkhunaa anupaadinnupaadaaniya.m ruupa.m passanti, dibbaaya sotadhaatuyaa ^a^T1.0502^ea^ sadda.m su.nanti, cetopariya~naa.nena anupaadinnupaadaaniyacittasama"ngissa citta.m jaananti. aakaasaana~ncaayatana.m vi~n~naa.na~ncaayatanassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo. aaki~nca~n~naayatana.m nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatanassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo. anupaadinnupaadaaniyaa khandhaa iddhividha~naa.nassa, cetopariya~naa.nassa, pubbenivaasaanussati~naa.nassa, yathaakammuupaga~naa.nassa, anaagata.msa~naa.nassa, aavajjanaaya aaramma.napaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] anupaadinnupaadaaniyo dhammo upaadinnupaadaaniyassa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo -- sekkhaa vaa puthujjanaa vaa anupaadinnupaadaaniye ruupe... sadde... gandhe... rase... pho.t.thabbe... anupaadinnupaadaaniye khandhe aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassanti, assaadenti abhinandati; ta.m aarabbha raago uppajjati...pe0... domanassa.m uppajjati. kusalaakusale niruddhe vipaako tadaaramma.nataa uppajjati. aakaasaana~ncaayatanakusala.m vi~n~naa.na~ncaayatanavipaakassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo. aaki~nca~n~naayatanakusala.m nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatanavipaakassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo. anupaadinnupaadaaniya.m ruupaayatana.m cakkhuvi~n~naa.nassa...pe0... pho.t.thabbaayatana.m kaayavi~n~naa.nassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo. [03] 61^b^.^eb^ upaadinnupaadaaniyo dhammo upaadinnupaadaaniyassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo -- ^b^anantaruupanissayo, pakatuupanissayo...pe0...^eb^. pakatuupanissayo -- kaayika.m sukha.m kaayikassa sukhassa, kaayikassa dukkhassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo. kaayika.m dukkha.m kaayikassa sukhassa, kaayikassa dukkhassa...pe0... utu kaayikassa sukhassa, kaayikassa dukkhassa...pe0... bhojana.m kaayikassa sukhassa, kaayikassa dukkhassa...pe0... kaayika.m sukha.m... kaayika.m dukkha.m... utu... bhojana.m kaayikassa sukhassa, kaayikassa dukkhassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo. [03] upaadinnupaadaaniyo dhammo anupaadinnupaadaaniyassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo -- ^b^aaramma.nuupanissayo, anantaruupanissayo, pakatuupanissayo...pe0...^eb^. pakatuupanissayo -- kaayika.m sukha.m upanissaaya daana.m ^a^T1.0512^ea^ deti, siila.m samaadiyati, uposathakamma.m karoti, jhaana.m uppaadeti, vipassana.m uppaadeti, abhi~n~na.m uppaadeti, samaapatti.m uppaadeti, paa.na.m hanati...pe0... sa"ngha.m bhindati. kaayika.m dukkha.m... utu.m... bhojana.m upanissaaya daana.m deti...pe0... sa"ngha.m bhindati. kaayika.m sukha.m... kaayika.m dukkha.m... utu... bhojana.m anupaadinnupaadaaniyaaya ^a^M1.0416^ea^ saddhaaya... siilassa... sutassa... caagassa... pa~n~naaya... raagassa... dosassa... mohassa... maanassa... di.t.thiyaa... patthanaaya upanissayapaccayena paccayo. (2)

[03] upaadinnupaadaaniyo ^a^V1.0476^ea^ dhammo anupaadinnaanupaadaaniyassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo. ^b^pakatuupanissayo^eb^ -- kaayika.m sukha.m upanissaaya magga.m uppaadeti, phalasamaapatti.m samaapajjati. kaayika.m dukkha.m... utu.m... bhojana.m upanissaaya magga.m uppaadeti, phalasamaapatti.m samaapajjati. kaayika.m sukha.m... kaayika.m dukkha.m... utu... bhojana.m maggassa... phalasamaapattiyaa upanissayapaccayena paccayo. [03] 62^b^.^eb^ anupaadinnupaadaaniyo dhammo anupaadinnupaadaaniyassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo -- ^b^aaramma.nuupanissayo, anantaruupanissayo, pakatuupanissayo...pe0...^eb^. pakatuupanissayo -- anupaadinnupaadaaniya.m saddha.m upanissaaya daana.m deti, siila.m samaadiyati, uposathakamma.m karoti, jhaana.m uppaadeti, vipassana.m uppaadeti, abhi~n~na.m uppaadeti, samaapatti.m uppaadeti, maana.m jappeti, di.t.thi.m ga.nhaati. anupaadinnupaadaaniya.m siila.m... suta.m... caaga.m... pa~n~na.m... raaga.m... dosa.m... moha.m... maana.m ^a^T1.0513^ea^... di.t.thi.m... patthana.m... utu.m... bhojana.m... senaasana.m upanissaaya daana.m deti...pe0... samaapatti.m uppaadeti, maana.m jappeti, di.t.thi.m ga.nhaati, paa.na.m hanati...pe0... sa"ngha.m bhindati. anupaadinnupaadaaniyaa saddhaa... siila.m... suta.m... caago... pa~n~naa... raago... doso... moho... maano... di.t.thi... patthanaa... utu... bhojana.m... senaasana.m... anupaadinnupaadaaniyaaya saddhaaya... siilassa... sutassa... caagassa... pa~n~naaya... raagassa... dosassa... mohassa... maanassa... di.t.thiyaa... patthanaaya upanissayapaccayena paccayo. pa.thamassa jhaanassa parikamma.m pa.thamassa jhaanassa...pe0... nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatanassa parikamma.m nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatanassa...pe0... pa.thama.m jhaana.m dutiyassa...pe0... aaki~nca~n~naayatana.m nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatanassa...pe0... paa.naatipaato paa.naatipaatassa...pe0... niyatamicchaadi.t.thi niyatamicchaadi.t.thiyaa...pe0.... (1)

[03] anupaadinnupaadaaniyo dhammo upaadinnupaadaaniyassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo -- ^b^anantaruupanissayo, pakatuupanissayo...pe0...^eb^. pakatuupanissayo -- anupaadinnupaadaaniya.m saddha.m upanissaaya attaana.m aataapeti paritaapeti, pariyi.t.thimuulaka.m dukkha.m paccanubhoti. anupaadinnupaadaaniya.m siila.m ^a^M1.0417^ea^...pe0... senaasana.m upanissaaya attaana.m aataapeti paritaapeti, pariyi.t.thimuulaka.m dukkha.m paccanubhoti. anupaadinnupaadaaniyaa saddhaa...pe0... senaasana.m kaayikassa sukhassa ^a^V1.0477^ea^, kaayikassa dukkhassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo. kusalaakusala.m kamma.m vipaakassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo. [03] 64^b^.^eb^ upaadinnupaadaaniyo ^a^V1.0478^ea^ ^a^M1.0418^ea^ dhammo upaadinnupaadaaniyassa dhammassa purejaatapaccayena paccayo -- aaramma.napurejaata.m, vatthupurejaata.m. ^b^aaramma.napurejaata.m^eb^ -- sekkhaa vaa puthujjanaa vaa cakkhu.m aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassanti, assaadenti abhinandanti; ta.m aarabbha raago uppajjati...pe0... domanassa.m uppajjati; kusalaakusale niruddhe vipaako tadaaramma.nataa uppajjati. sota.m... ghaana.m... jivha.m... kaaya.m... upaadinnupaadaaniye ruupe... gandhe... rase... pho.t.thabbe... vatthu.m aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassanti, assaadenti abhinandanti; ta.m aarabbha raago uppajjati...pe0... domanassa.m uppajjati. kusalaakusale niruddhe vipaako tadaaramma.nataa uppajjati. upaadinnupaadaaniya.m ruupaayatana.m cakkhuvi~n~naa.nassa...pe0... upaadinnupaadaaniya.m gandhaayatana.m... rasaayatana.m... pho.t.thabbaayatana.m kaayavi~n~naa.nassa purejaatapaccayena paccayo. ^b^vatthupurejaata.m^eb^ -- cakkhaayatana.m cakkhuvi~n~naa.nassa...pe0... kaayaayatana.m kaayavi~n~naa.nassa...pe0... vatthu upaadinnupaadaaniyaana.m khandhaana.m purejaatapaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] upaadinnupaadaaniyo dhammo anupaadinnupaadaaniyassa dhammassa purejaatapaccayena paccayo -- aaramma.napurejaata.m, vatthupurejaata.m. ^b^aaramma.napurejaata.m^eb^ -- cakkhu.m aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassanti, assaadenti ^a^T1.0516^ea^ abhinandanti; ta.m aarabbha raago uppajjati...pe0... domanassa.m uppajjati. sota.m...pe0... vatthu.m aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassati, assaadeti abhinandati; ta.m aarabbha raago uppajjati...pe0... domanassa.m uppajjati. dibbena cakkhunaa upaadinnupaadaaniya.m ruupa.m passanti. ^b^vatthupurejaata.m^eb^ -- vatthu anupaadinnupaadaaniyaana.m khandhaana.m purejaatapaccayena paccayo.
